string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_FIRE_DESC
string.body: Rough, wild and aggressive by nature, their harsh surroundings toughened the bodies of these people, and they have also gained the power of Fire from the elements.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_EARTH_DESC
string.body: A race consisting solely of males since the times of Ancient Elyos, they have obtained the power of Earth following the Cataclysm and have solid and unshakable strength.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_WIND_DESC
string.body: Prolonged isolation has led to a highly developed culture for this race. They possess great agility as well as endurance and like to amuse themselves with adventures and hunts.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_LIGHT_DESC
string.body: A faction that inherited the most from Ancient Elyos in terms of appearance, they are a proud people who believe they are the Chosen ones as they resemble the Elyos and were mostly spared during the Cataclysm.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_WATER_DESC
string.body: They are a race of females who possess the greatest intellectual power among all races, and their evolution sacrificed much of their physical attributes in exchange for the ability to use magic at will.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_WARRIOR
string.body: Warriors specialise in close combat, utilizing their great physical strength and prowess with melee weapons. Once a Warrior reaches a certain level of proficiency, they must choose the way of the Gladiator or the Templar.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_SCOUT
string.body: Scouts concern themselves with speed, agility, and awareness. They wear leather armour, making them vulnerable, so they specialise in hit and run tactics. A Scout will eventually become a Ranger or an Assassin.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_CLERIC
string.body: Priests use divine power to heal and to bolster the defences of their allies. They can use both long-range spells and melee attacks to deliver pain to the enemy. Clerics must choose between the path of a Chanter or a Cleric.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_MAGE
string.body: Mages delight in dealing awe-inspiring levels of damage. Their command over the elements is terrifying, but they are relatively vulnerable so they must be clever to survive. Mages may choose the school of the Sorcerer or the Spiritmaster.

string.name: STR_OPTION_AUTODETECTING
string.body: Now adjusting the settings to the computer environment. Please wait a moment.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_SERVERSHUTDOWN
string.body: The server is unavailable. Please try again later.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_INCORRECT_PASSWORD
string.body: Password is incorrect. Please enter it again.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_CONNECTING
string.body: Now connecting.... Please wait a moment.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_GAME_START
string.body: Start the game with this character.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_NOW_LOADING
string.body: Now moving.... Please wait a moment.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_CHOICE_MOUSE
string.body: You can see the character by using the right mouse button or mouse wheel.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_CREATE_RACE_INFO
string.body: Please choose your character's name, faction, and appearance.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_CREATE_SERVER_INFO
string.body: Please choose a server for your character.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_MOVE_CHARACTER_CHOICE
string.body: Return to the Character Selection screen.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_CREATE_SERVER_CROWDED
string.body: Server is busy. Cannot connect at this time. Please try again later.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_SAME_EXIST_CHARACTERNAME
string.body: That name is already in use. Please enter another.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_INVAILD_CHARACTERNAME
string.body: The name you have entered is not allowed. Please enter another name.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_CHOICE_CHARACTER_DELETE_CONFIRM
string.body: Are you sure you want to delete this character?

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_TIZERID
string.body: Traditionally famous for its mighty knights, this northern country is regarded as a powerful military state, but the barren lands and primitive state of its industries have left the country lagging furthest behind in terms of economy and wealth.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_FESRA
string.body: An eastern nation composed of several tribes, where the central government is weak and the tribal lifestyle is still maintained and emphasized. There exists agriculture and livestock farming industries based on its lush forests, but most of the produce go into feeding its citizens.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_EROLE
string.body: A nation located on the west of the Tower of Light, where the life of abstinence and celibacy is seen as ideal. A country full of devout priests of Aion, which also has the most developed economy thanks to a blessed environment.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_JUHDENIL
string.body: Developed by highly intellectual Water Elyos, this lowland country in the south boasts powerful magic and a high level of academia. It is where every Elyos who dreams of becoming a Sorcerer gathers from all over the world.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_RACE_NOT_READY
string.body: The selected faction is still being prepared.

string.name: STR_HELP_CONTENT2
string.body: Let's use a Combo. A skill is blinking on the Quickbar. This skill is used to activate the Chain Skill. Using skills in the order indicated by the arrow allows you to defeat enemies with overwhelming striking power.

string.name: STR_HELP_CONTENT4
string.body: Let's use a special attack. Select a target and use a special attack by clicking the skill indicated by the arrow on the skill window or on the Quickbar. With the special attack assistance skill, you can also transfer your DP to any group member who uses a special attack.

You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_STOLEN_NAME
string.body:
Your account has been banned on all of our servers for the abuse of identity as per our T&Cs and Terms of Use for our services.

You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_STOLEN_PAY
string.body:
Your account has been banned temporarily due to outstanding payments as per our T&Cs and Terms of Use for our services.

You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_HOUSE
string.body:
Your account has been banned due to advertising.

You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_BOT_AUTO
string.body:
Your account has been banned in accordance with the guidelines and user policies, because you used software that is prohibited for use in the game by the company.

You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_BOT_MANUAL
string.body:
Your account has been banned in accordance with the guidelines and user policies, because you used software that is prohibited for use in the game by the company.

You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_BOT_PERIOD
string.body:
Your account has been banned in accordance with the guidelines and user policies, because you used software that is prohibited for use in the game by the company.

You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_TRADE_7
string.body:
Your account has been banned for 7 days for illegal trading as per our T&Cs and Terms of Use for our services.

You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_TRADE_30
string.body:
Your account has been banned for 30 days for illegal trading as per our T&Cs and Terms of Use for our services.

You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_TRADE_EVER
string.body:
Your account has been banned for illegal trading on at least three counts as per our T&Cs and Terms of Use for our services.

You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_TRADE_ACCOUNT_30
string.body:
Your account has been banned for 30 days for illegal trading as per our T&Cs and Terms of Use for our services.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_TRADE_ACCOUNT_EVER

You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_TRADE_AGAIN
string.body:
Your account has been banned because you falsely reported an incident or disrupted our services inappropriately.

You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_TRADE_ACCOUNT
string.body:
Your account has been banned for illegally and repeatedly trading game accounts as per our T&Cs and Terms of Use for our services.

You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_STOLEN_ACCOUNT_MAYBE
string.body:
Your account has been banned due to account theft.

If you supplied us with an email address, we have sent you a notification.

If you are not involved in an account theft, please report this to AION Support (https://aion.support.gameforge.com). You can find further information on the AION website (https://en.aion.gameforge.com).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_STOLEN_ACCOUNT_LIE
string.body:
Your account has been banned as per our principles on account theft because you falsely reported an account theft.

Falsely reporting account theft can harm other players.

You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_STOLEN_ACCOUNT_NO_CONFIRM
string.body:
Your account was banned as per our T&Cs and Terms of Use for our services because you did not verify your account within the specified time after an account theft was reported.

Once you have confirmed your identity as per the terms and policies of our services, the ban will be lifted.

You can find further information on the AION website (https://en.aion.gameforge.com).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_FRAUD
string.body:
Your account has been banned for attempted fraud or other illegal conduct as per our T&Cs and Terms of Use for our services.

You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_FRAUD_7
string.body:
Your account has been banned for attempted fraud or other illegal conduct as per our T&Cs and Terms of Use for our services.

You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_FRAUD_EVER
string.body:
Your account has been banned for attempted fraud or other illegal conduct as per our T&Cs and Terms of Use for our services.

You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_GAMBLE
string.body:
Your account has been banned for illegal gambling.

You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_GAMBLE_30
string.body:
Your account has been banned for 30 days for illegal gambling.

You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_GAMBLE_EVER
string.body:
Your account has been banned for illegal gambling.

You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_BOT
string.body:
Your account has been banned for the use of illegal software and illegal conduct as per our T&Cs and Terms of Use for our services.

You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_ABUSE
string.body:
Your account has been banned for 7 days due to the abuse of system errors or similar.

This abuse can lead to technical problems or disruptions to the balance of the game.

You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_ABUSE_LIGHT
string.body:
Your account has been banned for the abuse of system errors.

This abuse can lead to technical problems or disruptions to the balance of the game.

You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_ABUSE_SERIOUS
string.body:
Your account has been banned for the abuse of system errors.

This abuse can lead to technical problems or disruptions to the balance of the game.

You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_OBSTRUCT
string.body:
Your account has been banned for illegal conduct as per our T&Cs and Terms of Use for our services.

You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_BAD_LANGUAGE
string.body:
Your account has been banned for using improper language/profanities.

You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_BAD_PROGRAM_BUT_BOT
string.body:
Your account has been banned in accordance with the guidelines and user policies, because you used software that is prohibited for use in the game by the company.

You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_PRETEND_INSIDER
string.body:
Your account has been banned as per our T&Cs and Terms of Use for our services because it was used deceptively to identify you illegally as a Gamemaster (GM), employee or business.

You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_PLAY_ABNORMAL
string.body:
Your account has been banned temporarily because you are suspected of having used unauthorised methods.

You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_BUNDLE
string.body:
Your account was banned temporarily because of a violation of our T&Cs or Conditions of Use for our services.

You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_ETC
string.body:
Your account has been banned for illegal conduct as per our T&Cs and Terms of Use for our services.

If you violate our T&Cs or the Terms of Use for our services, your account will be banned.

You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_EXTERNAL_REQUEST
string.body:
Your account has been suspended by an official request from a law enforcement agency.

This action was taken because an official request from such a body has legal implications. You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_UNPAIED
string.body:
Your account has been locked because of an outstanding payment.

Please contact AION Support (https://aion.support.gameforge.com).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_DETOUR_IP
string.body:
Your account has been banned due to suspected identity theft.

If this is not the case, you will be able to play again shortly.

You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

Please identify yourself on the Aion Free-to-Play website (www.aionfreetoplay.com) and start again.

string.name: STR_RACE_RESTRICT_ALL
string.body:
New players cannot create characters on that server.
If you already have a character on that server, you may create additional characters of the same race.

string.name: STR_RACE_RESTRICT_ONE
string.body:
You cannot create an %1 character on that server.
If you already have a character on that server, you can create additional characters of the same race.

string.name: STR_BLOCK_PC_ROOM_COMPLAIN
string.body:
Data related to the account, content and usage is stored in accordance with our Privacy Policy.
We have received a report that you logged into AION from an Internet café and deliberately left without paying.
Using an Internet café without the intention or ability to pay for the service is theft, and, as such, is a violation of the law.
Please contact us if you had nothing to do with this act.
You can contact us any time on the official website www.aionfreetoplay.com to find out more details.

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_SELF
string.body:
All game services using this account have been suspended upon your request.
You can find further information on the official Aion Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com).

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_BOT_AUTO
string.body:
Your account has been banned on all of our servers for unauthorised use of software in the game as per our T&Cs and Terms of Use for our services.
You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_BOT_MANUAL
string.body:
Your account has been banned on all of our servers for unauthorised use of software in the game as per our T&Cs and Terms of Use for our services.
You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_BOT_PERIOD
string.body:
Your account has been banned on all of our servers for 10 days for unauthorised use of software in the game as per our T&Cs and Terms of Use for our services.
Your account will be banned permanently if the same violation occurs again. You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_TRADE_ACCOUNT
string.body:
Your account has been banned on all of our servers due to illegal account swapping as per our T&Cs and Terms of Use for our services.
You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_STOLEN_PAY
string.body:
Your account has been banned on all of our servers due to outstanding payments as per our T&Cs and Terms of Use for our services.
You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_STOLEN_ACCOUNT_MAYBE
string.body:
Your account has been banned temporarily on all of our servers for the abuse of identity in registering as per our T&Cs and Terms of Use for our services.
You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_HOUSE
string.body:
Your account has been banned on all of our servers due to abuse for commercial purposes as per our T&Cs and Terms of Use for our services.
You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_BAD_BOARDER
string.body:
Your account has been banned because you regularly made posts on official websites that were in violation of the T&Cs and Terms of Use for our services.
You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_VIOLATION
string.body:
Your account has been banned because you were involved in illegal activity while using the game service.
You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_ABUSE_COIN
string.body:

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_ABUSE_FREE_COIN
string.body:

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_BAD_PROGRAM
string.body:
Your account has been banned as per our T&Cs and Terms of Use for our services because you undertook unauthorised activities to obtain confidential information or alter our game client.
You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_VIRUS
string.body:
Your account has been banned as per our T&Cs and Terms of Use for our services because unauthorised malicious software was activated on your account which puts other players and our game client at risk.
You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

Your account has been banned on all of our servers for the abuse of identity in registering as per our T&Cs and Terms of Use for our services.
You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_MSG_ERROR_REPORT_SEND_AGREE
string.body:
Send an error report of the Aion client automatically to the NCSOFT's error reporting server?

An error report contains information on the status of Aion, hardware configuration and other data at the time of error. The error report may contain personal information, but is not used by NCsoft.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_NCTASD_AUTHFAILED
string.body: The authentication number is incorrect. Please check the number once again.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_NCTASD_IVRNOTAVAILABLE
string.body: Telephone authentication service is currently under maintenance. Please try again later.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_NCTASD_AUTHTIMEOUT
string.body: The input time for the ARS number has expired.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_NCTASD_PHONENOTAVAILABLE
string.body: The telephone authentication service is unavailable as there is no phone connection or the line is busy. Please try again after moving to where there is phone connection or hanging up the phone.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_NCTASD_INVALIDCUSTOMERINFO
string.body: The telephone number is incorrect. Please check your registration information.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_NCTASD_NOTAVAILABLE
string.body: Telephone authentication service is currently under maintenance. Please try again later.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_NCTASD_TOOBUSY2
string.body: The telephone authentication service is currently unavailable due to a high customer demand. Please try again later.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_NCTASD_NOTPAID
string.body: Telephone authentication service period has expired. Please try again after you have paid for the service.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_NCTASD_AUTHBLOCKEDTEMP
string.body: Telephone authentication service is blocked due to repeated telephone authentication failures. Please try again later.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_NCTASD_CALLLIMITEXCEEDED
string.body: You have exceeded the number of times you can use the telephone authentication service in one day.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_NCTASD_AUTHALREADYINPROCESS
string.body:
To improve security, it will no longer be possible to sign up for the telephone authentication service after 28 March 2018.

The telephone authentication service will be stopped on 21 November 2018.

Use the more practical and secure NC authentication device or the OTP service!

Register for the service via your personal account on the plaync website (www.plaync.com).

string.name: STR_ERR_CANT_EXECUTE_MORE_GAME
string.body: You cannot run any more client.

string.name: STR_ERR_CANT_EXECUTE_FOR_RESTRICTED_NATION

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_PCINFO_INVALID_REGISTER_PC

string.name: STR_NCTASD_AUTH_STARTED

The telephone authentication service will be stopped on 21 November 2018.

Use the more practical and secure NC authentication device or the OTP service!

Register for the service via your personal account on the plaync website (www.plaync.com).

string.body:
If you seal an item, you cannot trade, sell, destroy, enhance, extract, store (in account warehouse or legion warehouse), modify the appearance of, or soul-bind the item.

You will be restricted in using consumable items.

You can unseal the item by using a Seal Removal Scroll . If you use a Seal Breaker, it takes 7 days to unseal completely.

string.name: STR_ITEM_SEAL_CONFIRM_UNSEALING_START

string.name: STR_MSGBOX_AKS_ENTER_PK_SERVER
string.body: This game area is a free PK area. Abide by the rules and you will have a great gaming experience.

string.name: STR_NOTICE_MIXED_RACED_AFTER_SERVER_MERGE
string.body:
In AION Free-to-Play you can only play on one faction per server – the Asmodians or the Elyos. As a result of the merge however, it will be temporarily possible to adventure with characters of both factions on the same server. As soon as this transitional phase is over, the old rules will apply once more. If you have characters on both factions on one server, you will be momentarily unable to continue playing.


To prevent this, we ask that you transfer some of your heroes to an alternate server. To do so, simply use the free character transfer available on the official AION website.
Go to https://en.aion.gameforge.com, log in using your account details and visit Account Management to access the character transfer option.


If you do not use the character transfer during the transfer phase, we will carry out an automatic transfer to ensure that you can continue playing. In this case, you will receive information from us in an email about the next steps.

To confirm, please enter “OK".

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_ACTION_PET_PC_CARE

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_PET_CONDITION_01

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_PET_CARE_UNDER_CONDITION

string.name: STR_TWITTER_RECOMMEND_PEOPLE_STATE_PEOPLE_INTRO_2
string.body:
Topics from the community will be presented and posts that missed out on making the headlines will be listed, just because it would be a shame if people never got to see them.

And with content such as AION hunks and babes and the invitation to Tazz's Notes, it will provide a different kind of entertainment from what you can find on the homepage.

string.name: STR_TAP_TOYPET_DOPING_DESC
string.body: Your pet uses food and magic items in the Buff Bag automatically before their effects expire.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_ACTION_PET_DOOPING
string.body: Orders the pet/minion to use food and magical items in your cube to provide buffs automatically. Items will be used in the registered order.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_ACTION_PET_LOOTING
string.body: Orders the pet/minion to pick up items dropped in the area. The pet may be unable to pick up certain items, such as items which your Group Distribution does not allow you.

string.name: STR_MSG_DOPING_PET_POPUP01
string.body: The minion or pet already has an item that cannot be used together with the selected item. Do you want to remove the existing item and add the selected item instead?

string.name: STR_ITEM_CHARGE_SCROLL_CONFIRM
string.body:
With %0%, a blessed enhancement of level %1% up to level %2 is performed.

The blessed enhancement is only valid for the divine item's level cap.

Do you really wish to perform a blessed enhancement?

string.name: STR_ITEM_CHARGE_ALL_SCROLL_CONFIRM
string.body:
With %0%, a blessed enhancement of up to level %1 is performed for all items used.

The level cap for blessed enhancements will not be exceeded, however.

Do you really wish to perform a blessed enhancement?

string.name: STR_ITEM_CHARGE_ALL_CONFIRM
string.body:
All the equipped items will be conditioned to the maximum level.

You need %qina0to do this. Are you sure you want to condition them?

string.name: STR_ITEM_CHARGE_CONFIRM_SOME_ALREADY_CHARGED
string.body:
You can condition only %0 of the registered items up to level %1.

You need %qina2to do this.

Are you sure you want to condition them?

string.name: STR_ITEM_CHARGE_CONFIRM_SOME_OVER_LIMIT
string.body:
You can condition only %0 of the registered items up to level %1 and the rest up to the permissible level.

You need %qina2to do this.

Are you sure you want to condition them?

string.name: STR_ITEM_CHARGE_CONFIRM_CHARGE_ALL_ITEMS
string.body:
The blessed enhancement on the item entered is possible up to level%0.

The level cap for blessed enhancements will not be exceeded, however.

You require %qina1 Do you really wish to continue?

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_FATIGUE_BODY
string.body: Your Fatigue has increased. If your Fatigue is full, you can earn only limited XP, Abyss Points, and items.\nYou do not accumulate Fatigue while in a big city or fortress or while you are in Private Store mode. Fatigue is reset to '0' every day at 6 AM.\nYou can completely recover from fatigue by clicking the Fatigue Recovery button. The Fatigue Recovery available is reset every Wednesday after the regular checkup.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_FATIGUE_STATE_RECOVER_FATIGUE_BODY
string.body: You have recovered from Fatigue. The Fatigue Recovery available is reset every Wednesday after the regular checkup.

string.name: STR_MSGBOX_FATIGUE_STATE_RECOVER_CONFIRM
string.body: Your remaining uses of Fatigue Recovery is %0. Uses will be reset every Wednesday after the regular checkup. Are you sure you wish to use Fatigue Recovery?

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_FATIGUE_STATE_BODY
string.body: Your Fatigue is full. You can only earn limited XP, Abyss Points, and items.\nFatigue is reset every day at 6 AM. You can completely recover from fatigue by clicking the Fatigue Recovery button.

string.name: STR_MSGBOX_WRONG_OTP_END_CLIENT
string.body: The NC OTP number entered is incorrect. The client will now close because you have entered an incorrect number %0 consecutive times.

string.name: STR_INSTANCE_DUNGEON_PARTY_MATCH_DESC
string.body:
[New Group/Alliance Access] Allows you to firstly create a new group/alliance and then enter the instance.

[Quick Group/Alliance Access] Search for individual players with requests to join and also for existing groups/alliances that allow you to enter the instance more quickly. This type of search expires after a period of time.

[Area for Join Requests/Access to Growth Zone]

▶ Fire Temple: Level 31-39

▶ Esoterrace: Level 40-48

▶ Beshmundir's Temple: Level 49-57

▶ Rentus Base: Level 58-66

▶ Tiamat's Fortress: Level 67-75

※ If the entry options for an instance are limited after levelling up, you can form a group directly by the entrance to the instance and then enter it.

string.name: STR_INSTANCE_DUNGEON_PVP_MATCH_DESC
string.body:
This Instance allows you to compete with another character until the time runs out.

Each training match consists of a maximum of 3 rounds, but it can end before that if you reach the time limit, or if one player accrues the winning number of points.

If you enter the Instance, all Enchant effects currently affecting you will be removed.

string.name: STR_IDARENA_PVP_CONFIRM_LEAVE
string.body:
Once you stop training and leave the zone, you can neither receive a reward nor get your ticket back.

Are you sure you want to stop training?

string.body:
You will resurrect automatically in 5 seconds.

For a short time afterward, you will be beneficially Enchanted.

string.name: STR_F2P_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_DEFENSE_HEADER_ALL
string.body: Congratulations on your successful siege (%2, 1%, %0)! You will receive rewards correspondent to your account type: [%bm_account_type].

string.name: STR_F2P_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_DEFENSE_BODY_ALL
string.body: \n\nBy purchasing a Gold Pack you can qualify for better rewards. [%shoplink]

string.name: STR_MSGBOX_HOUSING_INS_OWN_DO_YOU_ACCEPT_PAY
string.body: A studio costs <font font_xml="v3_msgbox_money">%qina0</font>. Are you sure you want to buy it?

string.name: STR_MSGBOX_DELETE_FILE
string.body: Are you sure you want to delete the '%0' file?

string.name: STR_MSGBOX_OVERWRITE_FILE
string.body: '%0' already exists. Do you want to overwrite the existing file?

string.name: STR_FINAL_OVERDUE_MAIL_HEADER
string.body: Hello, this is a notice from the House Administration.

string.name: STR_FINAL_OVERDUE_MAIL_BODY
string.body:
You have an unpaid maintenance fee. According to the housing management policy, %2% will be impounded.

You can re-buy the impounded house from the auction.

Thank you for taking good care of %2% so far.

string.name: STR_MSGBOX_HOUSING_BUILDING_CHANGE_CONFIRM
string.body:
If you click on 'OK', you will use a Renovation Coupon to receive your selected colour for the exterior.\nPlease note that all previous changes made to the exterior will be removed.

Switch to this exterior?

string.name: STR_MSGBOX_BUY_RANKITEM_CONFIRM
string.body: You may <font color="ff0000">be unable to use or equip some items in your purchase list depending on your Abyss Rank.</font> Are you sure you want to buy them?

string.name: STR_MSGBOX_BUY_RANKITEM_WITH_RANKDOWN_CONFIRM
string.body: You may <font color="ff0000">be unable to use or equip some items in your purchase list depending on your Abyss Rank.</font> Alternatively, your Abyss Rank may <font color="ff0000">decrease</font>. Are you sure you want to buy them?

string.name: STR_COMPOUND_RANKITEM_ASK_CONFIRM
string.body: Once they are combined, %1%will be destroyed. The rank limitationcan be changed for the combined item. Do you wish to continue with the combination of the two items?

string.name: STR_TOYPET_H_ABANDON_PET_CONFIRM
string.body:
Once you part with the pet, it will be deleted from the list and you cannot summon it again.

Are you sure you want to part with %0?

string.name: STR_HOUSINGOBJ_TOOLTIP_CANNOT_USE_NOT_SETUP
string.body: That cabinet is in storage at the Housing Warehouse.

string.name: STR_ITEM_CHARGE2_SCROLL_CONFIRM
string.body:
With %0%, a magic enhancement of up to level %2 is performed for %1%.

The level cap for magic enhancements will not be exceeded, however.

Do you really wish to perform a blessed enhancement?

string.name: STR_ITEM_CHARGE2_ALL_SCROLL_CONFIRM
string.body:
With %0%, a magic enhancement of up to level %1 is performed on all socketed items.

The magic enhancement is only increased up to the relevant item's level cap.

Do you wish to continue?

string.name: STR_ITEM_CHARGE2_ALL_CONFIRM
string.body: Pay %qina0 to magically charge all equipped items to their maximum levels. Do you really want to charge them?

string.name: STR_ITEM_CHARGE2_CONFIRM_CHARGE_ALL_ITEMS
string.body:
The magic enhancement of the selected item will only be carried out up to level %0.

This is the item's level cap for magic enhancement.

You require%ap1 for the magic enhancement. Do you want to continue with the magic enhancement?

string.name: STR_UI_ABANDON_TOYPET_H_CONFIRM
string.body: If you want to send away a pet, enter, '<font color="ff0000">%0</font>'.

string.name: STR_ITEM_CHARGE2_RANKDOWN_CONFIRM
string.body: If you charge the item with magical power, your Abyss rank will drop.

string.name: STR_ITEM_CHARGE2_USER_RANKDOWN_CONFIRM
string.body: If you charge the item with magical power, your Abyss rank may drop on the next charging.

string.name: STR_HOUSING_MODE_PARTS_CONFIRM
string.body: Click on "OK" to use the item. After confirmation it can only be used in this house/studio.

string.name: STR_ITEM_CHARGE2_ALL_CONFIRM_RANKDOWN
string.body:
All equipped items will be magically charged.

To do so, %ap0 is required.

The charge can result in a reduction to your Abyss Rank. Continue?

string.name: STR_ITEM_CHARGE2_CONFIRM_CHARGE_ALL_ITEMS_RANKDOWN
string.body:
Pay %ap1 to magically charge the registered item to Level %0 or its maximum level, whichever is lower.

If the item charges, your Abyss Rank will drop. Do you want to continue?

string.name: STR_ITEM_CHARGE2_ALL_CONFIRM_USER_RANKDOWN
string.body:
You need %qina0 to magically charge all the equipped items to their maximum levels.

If the items charge, your Abyss Rank may drop next time. Do you want to continue?

string.name: STR_ITEM_CHARGE2_CONFIRM_CHARGE_ALL_ITEMS_USER_RANKDOWN
string.body:
Pay %ap1 to magically charge the registered item to Level %0 or its maximum level, whichever is lower.

If the item charges, your Abyss Rank may drop next time. Do you want to continue?

string.name: STR_HOUSING_LBOX_EXPORT_DESC
string.body: You can copy and save the housing script data.

string.name: STR_HOUSINGOBJ_TOOLTIP_CAN_PLACE_LIMIT_TAG_ITEM
string.body: A maximum of %1 of these types of items can be placed.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_ZONETITLE_LEVEL_HUD
string.body: You cannot fight the opposing race here.

string.name: STR_MSGBOX_FATIGUE_AUTH_CONFIRM
string.body: The Fatigue Penalty is applied because you have either entered the incorrect personal information or failed to enter any information. If you click the Yes button, you can enter the correct information. If you click the No button, you get to play the game with the Fatigue Penalty.

string.name: STR_HOUSING_FIRST_OVERDUE_MAIL_HEADER
string.body: Hello, this is a notice from the House Administration.\n\nYou have an unpaid maintenance fee.

string.name: STR_HOUSING_FIRST_OVERDUE_MAIL_BODY
string.body: \n\nPay Maintenance Fees! As the Maintenance Fee was not paid by %0 at %1, %2 will be confiscated.

string.body: The NVIDIA graphics driver version 275.33 can result in an abnormal display. Please update to the latest driver available.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_DISRUPT_GAME_PLAY_3_DAYS
string.body:
Your account has been banned for 3 days for abuse of the game system and harassing other players.

You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_PLAY_ABNORMAL_7_DAYS
string.body:
Your account has been banned for 7 days due to the abuse of system errors or similar. This abuse can lead to technical problems or disruptions to the balance of the game.

You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.body:
Please select the message recipient who is to receive the message.
You can only send a %0 message once per day. 
A maximum number of 10 people can be selected.
The message will be sent to the recipient's house information.

string.name: STR_BUY_CONFIRM_OVERLAP_ITEM
string.body: You are about to purchase some duplicate items. Are you sure you want to buy these items?

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_HOUSING_REWARD_S_DESC
string.body: You have received a Deed to Palace. You don't suffer from after-effects following resurrection, the chance of craft combos and item drops increases by 5%, and Energy of Repose recovers 10% quicker when you log out from your Palace.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_HOUSING_REWARD_A_DESC
string.body: You have received a Deed to Estate. You don't suffer from after-effects following resurrection, the chance of craft combos increases by 5%, and Energy of Repose recovers 10% quicker when you log out from your Estate.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_HOUSING_REWARD_B_DESC
string.body: You have received a Deed to Mansion. You don't suffer from after-effects following resurrection, and Energy of Repose recovers 10% quicker when you log out from your Mansion.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_HOUSING_REWARD_C_DESC
string.body: You have received a Deed to House. Energy of Repose recovers 10% quicker when you log out from your House.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_HOUSING_REWARD_D_DESC
string.body: You have received a Deed to Studio. Energy of Repose recovers 5% quicker when you log out from your Studio.

string.name: STR_POPUP_HOUSING_ASK_MAXUP_ITEM_USE
string.body: If you use %0, the number of usable furniture increases by %2 for %DURATIONDAY1. Do you want to use this item?

string.name: STR_LDF4b_REWARD_MAIL_OCCUPY_HEADER_LIGHT
string.body: We have had an overwhelming victory in the siege for occupying %2 at %1 on %0.

string.name: STR_LDF4b_REWARD_MAIL_OCCUPY_BODY_LIGHT
string.body: \n\nAs reward for your %0-level achievement during the battle, you gain the following:

string.body: \n\nAs reward for your %0-level achievement during the battle, you gain the following:

string.name: STR_HS_ERROR_GAMEHACK
string.body: An illegal program has been detected.

string.name: STR_HS_ERROR_AUTOMACRO
string.body: Activity suspected to be a Macro has been detected.

string.name: STR_HS_ERROR_SPEEDHACK
string.body: Activity suspected to be a Speed Hack has been detected.

string.name: STR_HS_ERROR_DEBUGGER
string.body: An attempt to debug the game has been detected.

string.name: STR_HS_ERROR_ABNORMAL
string.body: The game's hack-prevention system has experienced an error.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_PORTAL_NAME_TUNNING_DIRECT_PORTAL
string.body: Test version of the Portal Rift

string.name: STR_HS_ERROR_DRIVER_FAILED
string.body: The hack-blocking drivers for HackShield have failed to load.

string.name: STR_HS_ERROR_MODULE_CHANGED
string.body: An attempt to manipulate the HackShield files has been detected.

string.name: STR_HS_ERROR_MEM_MODIFY
string.body: An attempt to manipulate the memory has been detected.

string.name: STR_AUTH_S_VERISIGN_CREDENTIAL_LOCKED
string.body: The VeriSign certification system has been locked.

string.name: STR_AUTH_S_VERISIGN_SYSTEM_ERROR
string.body: There has been a VeriSign certification system error.

string.name: STR_ASK_PASS_BY_INVADE_DIRECT_PORTAL
string.body:
Do you want to press into the enemy camp through the Portal Rift?

You will automatically join the Attack Alliance/League

and leave the existing group.

string.name: STR_ASK_INVADE_DIRECT_PORTAL_DEFENSE_FORCE
string.body:
The enemy have penetrated the Defence Zone of Space and Time.

Join the Defence Alliance/League?

The Defence Alliance/League breaks up automatically once it leaves the defensive zone.

string.name: STR_MSGBOX_DISASSEMBLEBOX_NOTICE
string.body: This box contains an item unavailable for trade. Are you sure you want what's in the box?

string.name: STR_AUTH_WARNING_SNDA_FATIGUE
string.body:
A Fatigue Penalty has been applied to your account.

If you log in right now, the penalty will be applied instantly. Please, enter your personal information before logging in.

string.name: STR_LITE__MSGBOX_CANT_START_WHILE_IN_CURRENT_STEP
string.body:
This client is limited to specific regions and partial functions.

The game files necessary to play as this character are missing.

Finish downloading Level %0 first.

string.name: STR_LITE__MSGBOX_CANT_USE_FUNC_WHILE_IN_CURRENT_STEP
string.body:
This client is limited to specific regions and partial functions.

The necessary game data for the selected function is missing.

To use, first finish downloading Level %0.

string.name: STR_LITE__STATUS_WINDOW_DOWNLOAD_NEXT_STEP
string.body: Game data for <font color="FFFF00">stage %0</font> is being downloaded.

string.name: STR_LITE__STATUS_WINDOW_NOW_AVAILABLE_STEP
string.body: If the game is restarted, data from<font color="FFFF00">Level %0</font>can be used.

string.name: STR_LITE__STATUS_WINDOW_FINISH
string.body: The game data download is complete.

string.name: STR_LITE__STEP1_DESC
string.body: The regions Poeta, Sanctum, Ishalgen, Altgard and Pandaemonium are playable.

string.name: STR_INVADE_DIRECT_POTAL_USE_COUNT
string.body: Usable: Level %num0 to %num1 \nALogged-in players: %num2/%num3\nRemaining usage time: %4

string.name: STR_ASK_INVADE_DIRECT_PORTAL_DEFENSE_FORCE_DARK
string.body:
The Asmodians have penetrated the Defence Zone of Space and Time.

Join the Defence Alliance?

The Defence Alliance dissolves automatically once it leaves the defensive zone.

string.name: STR_LITE__MSGBOX_INFO_DOWNLOAD_STATUS
string.body: The current download status can be viewed via ‘Download Status'.

string.name: STR_IDARENA_TEAM_MATCH_DESC
string.body:
Instance in which you compete against another group for a limited time.

Each battle has a maximum of three rounds. Training is complete once the time has run out or one group has reached the required number of Victory Points.

All active boosting effects are lifted when entering the instance.

string.name: STR_INVADE_DIRECT_POTAL_RESURRECT
string.body:
Click Confirm to immediately revive at the starting point of the Space-Time Battle Area.

You will be able to resurrect others at the same location within %0 minutes.

If the Portal Rift is closed, you will be transported to the resurrection bind location.

Waiting time: 10 seconds (%1 seconds remaining)

string.name: STR_INTRODUCTION_MESSAGE
string.body: Write a message to introduce yourself.

string.name: STR_INTRODUCTION_MESSAGE_DEFAULT
string.body: Hail! Please add me to your friends list. <fewer than 64 characters>

string.name: STR_INTRODUCTION_MESSAGE_NONE
string.body: Hail! Please add me to your friends list.

string.body:
This client is limited to specific regions and partial functions.

The necessary game data for the selected function is missing.

It can be used by installing the full version from the AION website.

This client is limited to specific regions and partial functions.

In order to play, the full version must be installed from the AION website.

string.name: STR_LITE__FULL_CLIENT_DESC
string.body: To play in other regions as well, you must install the <font color="FFFF00">complete game</font>.

This client is limited to specific regions and partial functions.

To continue, install thefull version from the AION website or select another character.

string.name: STR_UI_LOCK
string.body:
Change the UI Position

In this state, you can change the position of the Quickbar, the Quest Indicator, the Fortress Battle Information, and the Transparent Map. Click on the key to set their positions.

string.name: STR_UI_UNLOCK
string.body:
Set UI Position

In this state, you can set the position of the Quickbar, the Quest Indicator, the Fortress Battle Information, and the Transparent Map. Click on the key to change their positions.

string.name: STR_LDF5_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_OCCUPY_HEADER_LIGHT
string.body: We Elyos achieved an overwhelming siege victory when we conquered the %2 at %1 on %0.

string.name: STR_LDF5_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_OCCUPY_BODY_LIGHT
string.body: \n\nYou will receive the following reward for your success in the Level % battle:

string.name: STR_LDF5_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_OCCUPY_HEADER_DARK
string.body: We Asmodians achieved an overwhelming siege victory when we conquered %2 at %1 on %0.

string.name: STR_LDF5_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_OCCUPY_BODY_DARK
string.body: \n\nYou will receive the following reward for your success in the Level % battle:

string.name: STR_LDF5_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_DEFENSE_HEADER_LIGHT
string.body: You did a good job conquering the %2 at %1 on %0.

string.name: STR_LDF5_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_DEFENSE_BODY_LIGHT
string.body: You will receive the following sum as a reward:

string.name: STR_LDF5_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_DEFENSE_HEADER_DARK
string.body: You did a good job conquering the %2 at %1 on %0.

string.name: STR_LDF5_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_DEFENSE_BODY_DARK
string.body: You will receive the following sum as a reward:

string.name: STR_LDF5_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_PROTECT_TITLE_LIGHT
string.body: Reward notification from the defending Legion

string.name: STR_LDF5_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_PROTECT_HEADER_LIGHT
string.body: To the legionaries who were involved in defending %2 at %1 on %0.

string.name: STR_LDF5_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_PROTECT_TITLE_DARK
string.body: Reward notification from the defending Legion

string.name: STR_LDF5_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_PROTECT_HEADER_DARK
string.body: To the legionaries who were involved in defending %2 at %1 on %0.

string.name: STR_LDF5_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_DEFENDER_HEADER_LIGHT
string.body: We congratulate all Elyos for successfully defending the %2 at %1 on %0.

string.name: STR_LDF5_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_DEFENDER_BODY_LIGHT
string.body: \n\nAs a reward for your success in Level %0, you will receive the following:

string.name: STR_LDF5_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_DEFENDER_HEADER_DARK
string.body: We congratulate all Asmodians for successfully defending the %2 at %1 on %0.

string.name: STR_LDF5_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_DEFENDER_BODY_DARK
string.body: \n\nAs a reward for your success in Level %0, you will receive the following:

string.name: STR_LDF5_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_EMPTY_HEADER_LIGHT
string.body: We Elyos have successfully defended the %2 at %1 on %0.

string.name: STR_LDF5_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_EMPTY_BODY_LIGHT
string.body: \n\nTry a bit harder next time to earn one for yourself.

string.name: STR_LDF5_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_EMPTY_HEADER_DARK
string.body: We Asmodians successfully defended the %2 at %1 on %0.

string.name: STR_LDF5_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_EMPTY_BODY_DARK
string.body: \n\nTry a bit harder next time to earn one for yourself.

string.name: STR_LDF5_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_FAIL_HEADER_LIGHT
string.body: We Elyos have successfully defended the %2 at %1 on %0.

string.name: STR_LDF5_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_FAIL_BODY_LIGHT
string.body:
Our troops incurred heavy losses due to the low level of participation in the defence. We have therefore decided to use all the loot to repair the fortress instead of issuing rewards for this battle.

We request that all Daevas play an active role in defence in future.

string.name: STR_LDF5_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_FAIL_HEADER_DARK
string.body: We Asmodians successfully defended the %2 at %1 on %0.

string.name: STR_LDF5_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_FAIL_BODY_DARK
string.body:
Our troops incurred heavy losses due to the low level of participation in the defence. We have therefore decided to use all the loot to repair the fortress instead of issuing rewards for this battle.

We request that all Daevas play an active role in defence in future.

Notifications blocked

If you click on the key symbol while the user interface to the left of the Quickbar displays move/fixed, you can change the position at which the notifications appear.

string.name: STR_LITE__TOOLTIP_1_ESSENTIAL_DESC
string.body: - This is the data for the starting phase of the game. Therefore you cannot go beyond a certain level.

string.name: STR_LITE__TOOLTIP_2_ESSENTIAL_DESC
string.body: - The level restriction has been removed. You can now play in all regions.

string.name: STR_LITE__TOOLTIP_1_OBJECT_DESC
string.body: - Various styles of the low level costumes are displayed.

string.name: STR_LITE__TOOLTIP_2_OBJECT_DESC
string.body: - Various costume styles of various levels are displayed.

string.name: STR_LITE__TOOLTIP_1_MOVIE_DESC
string.body: - The intro video can be watched.

string.name: STR_LITE__TOOLTIP_1_MUSIC_DESC
string.body: - The background noise of the pre-set regions can be heard.

string.name: STR_LITE__TOOLTIP_2_MUSIC_DESC
string.body: - The background noise can be heard in all regions.

string.name: STR_LITE__TOOLTIP_1_L10N_DESC
string.body: - NPC dialogues and cutscenes can be heard in the pre-set areas.

string.name: STR_LITE__TOOLTIP_2_L10N_DESC
string.body: - NPC conversations and cutscenes can be heard in all regions.

string.name: STR_LITE__TOOLTIP_1_L10N_HELP_DESC
string.body: - The tutorial video can be watched.

string.name: STR_LITE__TOOLTIP_1_SOUND_VOICE_DESC
string.body: - The dialogues during combat can be heard even more clearly.

string.name: STR_LITE__TOOLTIP_1_SOUND_ETC_DESC
string.body: - Individual pets, cutscenes and surrounding noises can be heard.

string.name: STR_LITE__TOOLTIP_2_SOUND_ETC_DESC
string.body: - All pets, cutscenes and surrounding noises can be heard.

string.name: STR_LITE__TOOLTIP_1_ENV_DESC
string.body: - Colours and shading in pre-set areas become more intense.

string.name: STR_LITE__TOOLTIP_2_ENV_DESC
string.body: - Colours and shadows in all regions become more intense.

string.name: STR_ASK_REMOVE_BINDSTONE
string.body:
Re-installation will delete the previous Kisk.

Continue anyway?

string.name: STR_IDKAMAR_MATCH_DESC
string.body:
An instance in which a battle between the Elyos and the Asmodians will take place for a limited period of time.

Use of tanks or supplies and getting more points than the opposing side can lead to victory.

All enhancing effects will disappear upon entry.

string.name: STR_HOUSING_SALE_MENU_EXPIRE
string.body: Auction is coming to an end

string.name: STR_HOUSING_MODE_PARTS_CONFIRM_DEFAULT
string.body: An item is to be replaced by standard. It will be replaced as soon as you click on 'OK'.

string.name: STR_PACK_ITEM_DO_YOU_PACK
string.body:
Do you want to wrap %0?

If you wrap %0, you can trade it one time only with other players or via Trade Brokers, your private shop or mail attachment.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_ITEM_PACK_WARNING
string.body: [Note] When you acquire a wrapped item, it will be <font color="ff0000">unwrapped</font> automatically, and you will no longer be able to trade it.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_PACK_COMPOUND
string.body: The amount of wrappers will be set to zero in %1s.

string.name: STR_PACK_ITEM_DO_YOU_OPEN_PACK
string.body:
You have to unwrap %0 to be able to use it.

When you unwrap it, %1, %2.

string.name: STR_PACK_ITEM_DO_YOU_PACK_REALLY
string.body: Do you want to remove the wrapping?

string.name: STR_POPUP_DO_NOT_SETUP_BINDSTONE
string.body:
Setup not possible as %0 has already been activated.

A new setup is only possible if a personal Kisk has been activated.

string.name: STR_POPUP_DO_NOT_CONFIRM_BINDSTONE
string.body:
%0 cannot be set up.

Only a personal Kisk can be newly set up.

string.name: STR_IDLDF5_Under_01_War_MATCH_DESC
string.body:
Elyos and Asmodians will face off for a limited time in this instance.

Capturing bases will get you points. You win if you gain more points that the opposing faction.

All enhancing effects are removed when entering the instance.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_RIDEROBOT
string.body: Can be used when utilising the Mech

string.name: STR_ITEM_AUTHORIZE_CONFIRM
string.body:
Use %1% to upgrade %0%?

If the upgrade fails, the Upgrade Level will be reset..

string.name: STR_AUTHORIZE_ITEM_REIDENTIFY_WARNING
string.body: Re-identifications can no longer be effected once you have ascended. The remaining number of re-identifications will be deleted.

string.name: STR_ITEM_AUTHORIZE_RESET_CONFIRM
string.body:
Do you want to use %0 to reset the upgrade of %1?

The target item's upgrade level and upgrade status will be reset.

string.name: STR_IDLDF5_Fortress_Re_MATCH_DESC
string.body:
Elyos and Asmodians will face off for a limited time in this instance.

You win if you gain more points that the opposing faction.

All enhancing effects are removed when entering the instance.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CASH_USER_BODY
string.body: You have benefits. Your chance and the chance of your group to obtain loot items is increased by %0%%, and you receive an increase of %1.

string.name: STR_MULTI_RECIPE_WARNING_MSG
string.body:
All design variations (including the selected design) will be deleted.

Do you want to delete %0?

string.name: STR_MAIL_CHANGE_SERVER_TRADE_TITLE
string.body: Handing items over to the Trade Broker

string.name: STR_MAIL_CHANGE_SERVER_TRADE_BODY
string.body: Character transfer has been completed successfully. The items you registered with the Trade Broker on the previous server will be given back to you.

string.name: STR_MAIL_CHANGE_SERVER_SUCCESS_BODY
string.body: You are rewarded with a present on occasion of the successful character transfer. Have fun on the new server!

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_PCBANG_VITALPOINT_BODY
string.body: If you play while in an Internet café, you will enjoy special benefits. You will receive %0%% additional XP and your chance of obtaining loot items will be increased by %1%%.

string.name: STR_ITEM_AUTHORIZE_RESET_CONFIRM_02
string.body:
Do you want to use %0% to reset the upgrade level of %1%?

The upgrade level of the target item will remain intact; only the upgrade status will be reset.

string.name: STR_MSGBOX_REIDENTIFY_OPTION
string.body: Do you want to re-identify the option of %0?

string.name: STR_MSGBOX_REIDENTIFY_PREVIEW_OPTION
string.body: The result of re-identifying the option of %0.

string.name: STR_MSGBOX_REIDENTIFY_INFO
string.body:
You can view the result in an extra window and then decide whether you want to use it.

Even if you do not use it, the amount of possible re-identifications will be reduced by 1, and one re-identification item is used.

string.name: STR_MSGBOX_REIDENTIFY_OPTION_INFO
string.body:
You can view the result in an extra window, but you cannot reset it.

The amount of remaining re-identifications is not reduced.

string.name: STR_MSGBOX_REIDENTIFY_PREVIEW_INFO
string.body: Even if you do not use the result, the amount of remaining re-identifications and re-identification items will not be restored.

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_COMMON
string.body:
Your account rights have been restricted.

You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_COMMON
string.body:
Your account rights have been restricted.

You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

The fortress Honour Points are transferred as well when handing over the Brigade General duty.

Are you sure you want to hand the Legion Brigade General office to %0?

string.body:
The Legion will remain in disband mode for one day after your request. Are you sure you want to disband the Legion?

If the Legion is disbanded, the Honour Points will be deducted from the fortress.

Enhance %0% with the Manastone '%1'?

string.body: Cannot connect to the master server.

string.body: If speech output has been activated, you can no longer change the output device.

string.name: STR_INSTANCE_TIME_OVER
string.body: You exceeded the time limit. You leave %0.

string.name: STR_PCBANG_BUFF_BOOST_DESC
string.body: Increases Weapon Attack by 25 points, Magic Boost by 125 points, the maximum HP by 1,000 points and Healing Boost by 50.

string.body: Do you want to accept all the items attached to the selected letters?

Boost %0% to '%1' %2 %3 times?

Use

on %0 '%1' %2 to enchant %3% %4 times?

Use %2 '%1' and %4 %3 on %0 to enchant %5% %6 times?

Enchant %0% with %1%?

string.body:
Enchant %0% with %1%?

string.body:
Players waiting to enter: %0

Waiting time after submitting the petition: %DURATIONTIME1

string.body:
The appearance of %1 will be transferred to %0%.

%1 won't be destroyed; it only extracts the appearance.

string.name: STR_TRADE_IN_UPGRADE_DIALOG__DESC
string.body: Can be purchased if the current Enhancement Level of %0 is <font color="FF0000">Level %1</font> or higher. The <font color="FF0000">enhancement information</font> of %0 is <font color="FF0000">transferred</font> to the item you will purchase.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_NEED_IDENTIFY_INFO_UPGRADE
string.body: Dependent on the item to be registered

string.name: STR_REGISTER_ITEM_UPGRADE_DIALOG__DESC
string.body:
Please register the item you want to have enhanced.

Only items that have reached a particular enchantment level and are made from materials that meet the requirements can be enhanced.

Armsfusion data is retained when levelling up whereas the Enchantment Level/Manastone Socketing data and identification data are reset.

Click on 'Result' to compare before and after.

string.name: STR_ASK_PASS_BY_SVS_DIRECT_PORTAL
string.body: Do you want to enter the Advance Corridor?

string.name: STR_CONFIRM_SVS_DIRECT_PORTAL_OUT
string.body:
You have left the Advance Corridor Battle Region.

You are being sent back to the Corridor entrance.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_UPGRADE_ITEM_INFO
string.body: When you purchase an item that can be enhanced, it may retain its <font color="FF0000">enhancement information</font>.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_UPGRADE_ENCHANTED_ITEM_INFO
string.body: Only items with <font color="FF0000">Enchantment Level %0 or higher</font> can be equipped.

string.name: STR_GLOBAL_OPTION_DIALOG__NCPING_USER_AGREE
string.body:
AION Ping adjusts the technical settings (Register) to improve communication between the client and the server.

Using this function improves the reaction time in the game.

However, it is also possible that activating AION Ping during the game will reduce the network speed of other programs or interrupt these programs.

You can find more information on this function in the AION Ping settings guide.

string.body: Click on 'Chance' \nto resume at the failed level.\n This is only possible once per game.

string.name: STR_POPUP_GACHA_RETRY_CONFIRM
string.body:
For %num1 %0, you can continue from the failed level.

If you fail again, you will receive the reward for the last level you achieved.

Continue?

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_GACHA_REWARD_BUTTON
string.body: You can obtain the reward for\nthe current Enhancement Level\nby clicking on the corresponding button.

string.name: STR_POPUP_GACHA_FEVERTIME_CHECK
string.body:
Nyerk Fever has begun!

Your odds have increased and more valuable rewards are available.

string.name: STR_GACHA_EXPLANATION_GAME
string.body:
1. Shugo Game

In this game, you can use one Lucky Coin to enhance a weapon. You receive a reward according to the level reached.

string.name: STR_GACHA_EXPLANATION_LUCKY
string.body:
2. Shugo Game Points

Obtain Shugo Game Points by using Lucky Coins.

3. Nyerk Fever

Your Nyerk Fever begins when you have collected 100 Shugo Game Points. You can receive even more valuable rewards during this time.

string.name: STR_GACHA_EXPLANATION_FAILURE
string.body:
4. Enhancement Failed

If the enhancement fails, you will receive a reward amount for the lowest enhancement level instead of your current level.

string.name: STR_GACHA_EXPLANATION_BUTTON
string.body:
5. Continue/Stop Button

Click on the Continue Button to try a Weapon Boost. Click the Stop Button to receive the reward amount for the current Enhancement Level.

string.name: STR_GACHA_EXPLANATION_RETRY
string.body:
6. Chance

If you fail, you can use additional coins for a single chance to resume the game, starting at the level at which you failed. The number of coins required to resume depends on the level. If you fail again, you will not receive the lowest-level reward but will receive the reward from the level from which you continued.

string.name: STR_GACHA_EXPLANATION_GRADE
string.body:
7. Reward Chest

This chest contains precious rewards. You'll receive a box for one of the four different levels, depending on your current Enhancement Level. When you open it, it will reveal a random item.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_ACTION_PET_PETBUFF
string.body: The Pet cheers its Master on non-stop. When it gets tired, it chows down on Aether Cherries. The amount of food they eat depends on the eating habits of each Pet.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_ABSOLUTEEXP_BODY
string.body: You have obtained the Blessing of Wisdom. Whilst its effects are active, you will receive %0%% extra experience points for hunting, gathering and production jobs.

string.body: If enchanting fails, the enchanting level decreases to %0.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_ABUSE_90_DAYS
string.body:
Your account has been banned for 90 days due to the abuse of system errors or similar.

This abuse can lead to technical problems or disruptions to the balance of the game.

You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_FRAUD_90_DAYS
string.body:
Your account has been locked for 90 days for attempted fraud or illegal conduct.

You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_FRAUD_180_DAYS

Your account has been locked for 180 days for attempted fraud or illegal conduct.

You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_ATTEMPTED_FRAUD_90_DAYS
string.body:
Your account has been locked for 90 days for attempted fraud or harassment.

You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_GAMBLE_7
string.body:
Your account has been banned for 7 days for illegal gambling.

You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_GAMBLE_90
string.body:
Your account has been banned for 90 days for illegal gambling.

You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_UNFAIR_PROFITS_3_DAYS
string.body:
Your account has been banned for 3 days for improper acquisition of XP, AP, GP and Kinah as per our T&Cs and Terms of Use for our services.

You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_TRADE_90_DAYS
string.body:
Your account has been banned for 90 days for illegal trading as per our T&Cs and Terms of Use for our services.

You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_BREAK_DEAL_7_DAYS
string.body:
Your account has been banned for 7 days because you wrongfully took an item while playing in the group.

You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_BREAK_DEAL_90_DAYS
string.body:
Your account has been banned for 90 days because you wrongfully took an item while playing in the group.

You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_FRAUD_30_DAYS
string.body:
Your account has been banned for 30 days for fraud or other illegal conduct as per our T&Cs and Terms of Use for our services.

You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_ATTACKDELAY
string.body: Attack speed. The lower the number, the faster the attack speed.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_PHYATTACK
string.body: The strength of the weapon attack. The higher the number, the higher the weapon attack power.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_MAGATTACK
string.body: The strength of the weapon attack. The higher the number, the higher the weapon attack power.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_HITACCURACY
string.body: The probability of hitting a target with a physical attack. The higher the number, the lower the probability that the target will Evade, Parry, or block with a Shield.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_CRITICAL
string.body: The probability of a critical attack. The probability of a crit. strike increases by %0%%.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_MAGBOOST
string.body: The ability to enhance a magic attack. The higher the number, the more powerful the magic attack.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_MAGACCURACY
string.body: The probability of hitting a target with a magical skill. The higher the number, the lower the probability that the target will repel your attack with a magical skill.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_MAGCRITICAL
string.body: The probability of a magical critical spell occurring. The probability of a crit. strike increases by %0%%.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STA_HEAL_BOOST
string.body: Boost the HP Recovery effect. The higher the value, the more effective the regeneration skill.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_CASTINGTIME
string.body: The speed with which you conjure a magical skill. The lower the number, the faster the casting speed.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_PHYDEFEND
string.body: Defence against Physical Attacks. The higher the number, the lower the damage inflicted by a physical attack.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_BLOCK
string.body: The probability of repelling an attack with a Shield. You have a %1%% probability of blocking an opponent with %0 accuracy.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_PARRY
string.body: The probability of deflecting an attack with a weapon. You have a %1%% probability of parrying an opponent with %0 accuracy.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_DODGE
string.body: The probability of evading a physical attack. You have a %1%% probability of evading an opponent with %0 accuracy.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_PHYSICAL_CRITICAL_REDUCE_RATE
string.body: Probability that a Physical Attack will not deal a Critical Strike. The higher the number, the less likely that the attacker will deal a Physical Critical Strike.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_PHYSICAL_CRITICAL_DAMAGE_REDUCE
string.body: Crit strike defence. The higher the number, the less powerful the enemy's crit strike.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_MAGICAL_NEW_DEFENCE
string.body: The probability of repelling magic attacks. Your resist magic has a %1%% probability of succeeding on an opponent with %0 magical accuracy.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_MAGICAL_SKILL_BOOST_RESIST
string.body: Defence against magic attacks. The higher the number, the lower the damage you suffer from a magic attack.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_MAGDEFEND
string.body: Balancing level for received Magical Skill boosts The higher the number, the less likely that the attacker will successfully add Magic Boost to a magical skill.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_MAGICAL_CRITICAL_REDUCE_RATE
string.body: Probability that a Magical Attack will not deal a Critical Strike. The higher the number, the less likely that the attacker will deal a Magical Critical Spell.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_MAGICAL_CRITICAL_DAMAGE_REDUCE
string.body: Crit spell defence. The higher the number, the less powerful the enemy's crit spell.

Kysis Fortress Invasion Corridor

Miren Fortress Invasion Corridor appears

[Elyos] Sanctum Corridor appears

string.name: STR_ABYSS_OP_BENEFIT_3

Contains all the benefits of Level 2 Landing Sites

Merchants for crafting materials, designs and consumable items as well as one distributor appear

Akaron Corridor and Kaldor appear

string.name: STR_ABYSS_OP_BENEFIT_4
string.body:
Contains all benefits of Level 3 Landing Sites

Life Energy appears, which increases the maximum HP

Reinforcement soldier appears for Garrisons 60 to 65

Consumables merchant (Insignias of Honour) appears

A Relic Administrator appears

Entry assistant for the Rift of Oblivion appears

string.name: STR_ABYSS_OP_BENEFIT_5

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_EXP_BOOST_DESC
string.body: The Energy of Growth is applied. While the effect lasts, your XP earned while hunting, gathering and handcrafting are increased by %0%%. When all the Energy of Growth is consumed, the effect vanishes.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_DESC_ENCHANT
string.body: •Enchantment Stones can be used to increase the Boost Level of certain items. A higher Boost Level also increases the item's stats. The chance of success can be increased depending on the boost material and socketing aid used.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_DESC_EXCEED_ENCHANT
string.body: •You can also perform an equipment evolution. Increasing an item's boost level also increases its stats.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_DESC_ENCHANT_OPTION
string.body: •Items boosted with Manastones receive higher stats.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_DESC_PROC
string.body: •Divine power was bestowed upon the weapon.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_DESC_AUTHORIZE
string.body: •You can use Upgrade Serums to improve item skills. The higher the level of the Upgrade Serum, the better the values of the item.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_DESC_POLISH
string.body: •The power of Idian will be bestowed on the weapon. If you use weapons strengthened with Idian, this effect will disappear slowly. When all effects have been used, the Idian values will disappear.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_DESC_REIDENTIFY
string.body: •Items that received random values during identification can be awarded new values through re-identification.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_DESC_CHARGE
string.body: •Conditions or augments items. The level will be determined according to the material used.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_DESC_EXTRACT
string.body: •Extract items to receive Slot Stones or upgrade materials. The extracted item disappears.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_DESC_AP_EXTRACT
string.body: •Extract items to receive Abyss Points. The extracted item disappears.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_DESC_DYE
string.body: •You can use this dye to change the colour of a piece of armour.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_DESC_PACK
string.body: •Leave tradeable/sellable items unpackaged to keep them tradeable/sellable. Packaged items can be traded/sold once.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TARGET_ENCHANT

experiments appeared through this passage.

A weapons factory built by Mechanerk

of the machines.

string.name: STR_IDLDF5_Under_02_War_MATCH_DESC
string.body:
Elyos and Asmodians will face off for a limited time in this Instanced Zone.

Transform yourself into a Shugo and collect components for the machine weapon. You win if you gain more points that the opposing faction.

All enhancing effects are removed when entering the Instanced Zone.

string.name: STR_IDLDF5_Fortress_War_MATCH_DESC
string.body:
An Instanced Zone is a place in which a battle between the Elyos and the Asmodians will take place for a limited period of time.

The side which unseals the most Rune Relics and scores the most points will win.

All enhancing effects will disappear upon entry to the Instanced Zone.

string.name: STR_STIGMA_ENCHANT_CONFIRM_OPTIONBUFFEVENT_STIGMA
string.body:
Do you want to boost %0%?

If the Stigma Gain effect is active and a boost fails, the level is not reduced to 0, but only by 1 level.

Stigmas with level 0 will also not be further reduced if the boost fails.

string.name: STR_LUNA_ABYSS_TRAINNING_DESC
string.body: This is the training area for the fortress battle.

string.name: STR_LUNA_WARDROBE_EXPAND_CONFIRM
string.body:
You will need %luna0% to add more spaces in the wardrobe.

Do you want to continue?

string.name: STR_LUNA_WARDROBE_REG_CONFIRM
string.body:
You can store %0% in the wardrobe and use it to change the appearance of various items.

%0% will be deleted from the inventory and can only be used in the wardrobe.

Storing items in the wardrobe is only free of charge at the beginning. A fee will be charged to exchange items of clothing. Do you want to store the item in the wardrobe?

string.name: STR_LUNA_WARDROBE_CHANGE_CONFIRM
string.body:
Do you want to remove the %1%, which is stored in the wardrobe, and exchange it for %0%?

%0% will be deleted from the inventory and can only be used in the wardrobe.

You will need %luna2% to make the trade.

Do you want to continue?

string.name: STR_LUNA_WARDROBE_CHANGE_SKIN_DONE
string.body:
The appearance of %0% will be changed to %1%.

As long as the appearance change of an item in the wardrobe is still in effect, this item cannot be traded, sold via a Trade Broker or saved in the Account and Legion Warehouse. Moreover, the soul-binding cannot be removed for the item. It cannot be attached to mail or wrapped, and its appearance cannot be changed.

Do you want to continue?

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_LUNA_WARDROBE_USED
string.body: Skin for Luna wardrobe (can only be removed in wardrobe)

string.name: STR_LUNA_WARDROBE_DELETELOOK_CONFIRM

string.name: STR_LUNA_SIEGE_BOOSTON_CONFIRM
string.body: You use the mercenary support for the %0 fortress battle. You need %luna1 to receive the support. The mercenary support will remain active until the rewards for the fortress battle are distributed. Do you want to activate the boost?

string.name: STR_TOPPING_PHYSICALDAMAGEREDUCERATE_SP_01_DESC
string.body: Increases Crit Strike Resist by 15 points.

string.name: STR_LUNA_MANUFACTURE_GOSSIP_01
string.body: This offer won't be here every day! You'd better craft it right away, before it's too late.

string.name: STR_LUNA_MANUFACTURE_GOSSIP_02
string.body: The box with the mysterious supplies is only available free of charge once every day, akakak.

string.name: STR_LUNA_CLOSET_GOSSIP_01
string.body: Does Daeva really want to let off some steam, akakak?

string.name: STR_LUNA_CLOSET_GOSSIP_02
string.body: Isn't it a waste if you only use it once, akakak?

string.name: STR_LUNA_ABYSS_TRAINNING_GOSSIP_01
string.body: You refuse to participate in the fortress battle because no one is acknowledging your efforts?

string.name: STR_LUNA_ABYSS_TRAINNING_GOSSIP_02
string.body: Everyone who makes an effort during mercenary training will be rewarded.

string.name: STR_LUNA_ID_GOSSIP_01
string.body: Hey, would you like to go on an adventure with me?

string.name: STR_LUNA_ID_GOSSIP_02
string.body: There are rumours that there are many mysterious materials on Madrunerk's Island.

string.name: STR_LUNA_REWARD_GOSSIP_01
string.body: Shugo's name is Munirunerk, akakak... The more Luna Daeva uses, the more gifts Shugo will give Daeva!

string.name: STR_LUNA_REWARD_GOSSIP_02
string.body: You can use the keys I will give you to open the Treasure Chests. Just wait and see what you'll find inside.

string.name: STR_LUNA_SIEGE_TELEPORT_CONFIRM
string.body: You teleport to the area in which the %0 is taking place. You need %luna1 to teleport. Do you want to teleport?

However, the materials will not be returned if you fail.

string.name: STR_LUNA_CRAFT_MYSTERY_BOX_INFORMATION
string.body:
No special materials are required to craft Mysterious Supply Boxes.

You can craft the material free of charge once every day.

Afterwards, you will need Luna to craft .
