string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_HIGHCRAFT_LOWLEVELCRAFT_SUPPORT
string.body: You will be redirected to craft these materials.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_HIGHCRAFT_HIGHLEVELCRAFT_SUPPORT
string.body: You will be redirected to craft higher-quality items for these materials.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_HIGHCRAFT_HIGHLEVELCRAFT_SUPPORT_CANNOT
string.body: The item which was selected for high-quality crafting cannot\nbe found or does not exist.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_ITEM_CAN_EQUIPLEVEL_ADJ
string.body: Level decreasing scroll can be used

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_ITEM_CANNOT_EQUIPLEVEL_ADJ
string.body: Level decreasing scroll cannot be used

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_DESC_EQUIPLEVEL_ADJ
string.body: •The level reduction tool can be used to decrease levels.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TARGET_EQUIPLEVEL_ADJ
string.body: •Place the item for the level reduction in the appropriate slot.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TOOL_EQUIPLEVEL_ADJ
string.body: •Please place the material item to be used for the level reduction into the appropriate slot.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_PREDICT_EQUIPLEVEL_ADJ
string.body:
If successful, the level is decreased by 1 to 3 levels

If it fails, the deployed materials are destroyed and the level is not reduced

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_PREDICT_EQUIPLEVEL_ADJ_WARNING
string.body: If it fails, the deployed materials are destroyed and the level is not reduced

string.name: STR_INGAME_GOTCHA_TRANSFER_CONFIRM
string.body: The Shugo game is finished and you receive the reward for the level you achieved. Do you want to continue?

string.name: STR_JUMPING_BUTTON_TOOLTIP
string.body: When you create a character, it starts out at Level %0.

string.name: STR_HIGHREFORM_EMPTYSLOT
string.body:
•Place the item which is to undergo a Magical Morph into the central position.

•Only High Daeva items can be used for the Magical Morph.

•The type of morphing result is identical to that of the initial item.

string.name: STR_HIGHREFORM_TARGET
string.body:
•The Morph item was registered.

•You must register at least one material item for the Magical Morph.

•Material items must be of the same type as the initial item.

string.name: STR_HIGHREFORM_CAN_REFORM
string.body:
•You can register up to 6 material items.

•Items which were employed for morphing have been used up.

•Caution: Used items cannot be restored.

•The result may vary depending on the value or the quantity of the item.

•With a little luck, you might acquire extra rewards.

string.name: STR_HIGHREFORM_RESULT_WITH_BONUS
string.body: Morph successful + extra bonus

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_DESC_CPSTONE_ITEM_ENCHANT
string.body: •Estima Sacred Water or an All-Powerful Enchantment Stone can be used to increase the Estima Boost Level. A higher Boost Level also increases the Estima Power of Creation.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TARGET_CPSTONE_ITEM_ENCHANT
string.body: •Place the Estima item to be buffed into the appropriate buffing position.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TOOL_CPSTONE_ITEM_ENCHANT
string.body: •Place the material item to be used for Estima buffing into the appropriate buffing position.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_PREDICT_CPSTONE_ITEM_ENCHANT
string.body:
In the event of a failure, %2 is destroyed.

If successful, you will achieve Boost Level %0 → %1.

Power of Creation %3 → %4

string.name: STR_LUNA_MANUFACTURE_GOSSIP_03
string.body: If you are missing any materials, go to Takki. He will show you which instance to enter.

string.name: STR_LUNA_CLOSET_GOSSIP_03
string.body: Don't worry; getting rid of the skin won't cost you anything...

string.name: STR_LUNA_ABYSS_TRAINNING_GOSSIP_03
string.body: Would you like to try it?

string.name: STR_LUNA_ID_GOSSIP_03
string.body: I am a cold, hard mercenary. Your words mean nothing to me.

string.name: STR_LUNA_REWARD_GOSSIP_03
string.body: What? You don't have a key? Then open it with Luna!

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_NEED_GLORY_POINT_RANK
string.body: To retain the rank of a 1-Star Officer or higher,\nyou need to have earned more than %0[%gchar:glory_point] this week.

string.body: The free dice are delivered every Wednesday at 9 AM and the game is reset. Free dice are only assigned to player accounts with a character of level 46 or above.

string.name: STR_INSTANCE_DUNGEON_PVP_TOURNAMENT_DESC
string.body:
32 participants take part in duels against each other.

The battles take place in the Gold Arena. The winners get through to the next round.

The contest ends as soon as the winner has been decided. The reward depends on the final result.

string.name: STR_HTML_SHOW_REPEAT_REWARD_CYCLE_HEAD
STR_INSTANCE_DUNGEON_INVASION_MATCH_DESC
string.body:
Create an automatically assembled Legion/Alliance and enter the Instanced Zone.

Automatically assembled groups are limited in terms of group invites.

You leave the group automatically if you leave the Instanced Zone.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TARGET_REMOVE_OPTION
string.body: *Place the item whose Manastone will be removed into the appropriate slot.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_DESC_REMOVE_OPTION
string.body: *Manastones that are socketed in items can be removed. Manastones that are removed will not be restored.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TARGET_COMPOUND_WEAPON
string.body: *Place the weapon that is to receive the fusion effect into the fusion slot. If a fused weapon is fused with another weapon, the original fusion effect will be lost.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TOOL_COMPOUND_WEAPON
string.body: *Place the weapon from which the fusion effect will be extracted into the appropriate slot. Before the level reduction, the secondary weapon must have a lower level than the primary weapon.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_DESC_COMPOUND_WEAPON
string.body: *By fusing two-handed weapons of one type, the primary weapon receives the secondary weapon's Manastone slots, its enhancements/magic charges, additional values, standard attack values and magic boosts. The secondary weapon is lost in the process.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_ABYSS_FORT_BATTLE_GUIDE_NOTICE_MSG_P1
string.body:
Click on the login button to enter the fortress Battle League.

If you enter the fortress Battle League, you automatically leave your previous group/alliance.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_ABYSS_FORT_BATTLE_GUIDE_NOTICE_MSG_P2
string.body: You can also use the chat during the Battle League preparations.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_ABYSS_FORT_BATTLE_GUIDE_ANOTHER_FORT_INFO
string.body: Status of the other fortress battles

string.name: STR_ABYSS_FORT_BATTLE_GUIDE_BEFORE_AUTOMATCHING_DESC
string.body: If the number of members exceeds %0, the Battle League is formed 5 minutes before the battle starts.

string.name: STR_ABYSS_FORT_BATTLE_GUIDE_BEFORE_BATTLE_DESC
string.body: If the number of members is %0, the Battle League starts within one minute.

string.name: STR_ABYSS_FORT_BATTLE_GUIDE_ON_BATTLE_DESC
string.body: You do not receive a reward for the fortress battle if no Battle League is formed.

string.name: STR_ASK_ROUND_RETURN_ITEM_DO_YOU_ACCEPT_MOVE
string.body: Do you want to use %0? Once you arrive in the capital, if you click on the return icon you will return to this place.

string.name: STR_ASK_ROUND_RETURN_ITEM_ACCEPT_MOVE_DONT_RETURN
string.body:
Do you want to use %0?

You cannot return to this area.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_ROUND_RETURN_ITEM_REMAIN_TIME
string.body: You return to the place where you used the Round Trip Scroll. Returning is only possible from the capital.\nTime remaining: %DURATIONTIME0

string.name: STR_ACCEPT_ROUND_RETURN_ITEM_MOVE
string.body: Do you want to return to the place where you used the Round Trip Scroll?

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_ABSOLUTEAP_EXTRA_BOOST_BODY
string.body: The Silver Star's Energy has been recharged. Amount of AP received is increased by %0%% when hunting, defeating the enemy faction and in Instances with AP rewards. The effect ends when the energy is used up.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_ABSOLUTEAP_OVER_BOOST_BODY

string.name: STR_FAMILIAR_DIALOG_FFUNCTION_USE_CONFIRM_INDEX_DESC
string.body:
Using the minion function for 30 days costs %qina0. As soon as you pay, you can use all minions except special minions.

Do you want to continue?

string.name: STR_FAMILIAR_DIALOG_FFUNCTION_AUTOCONTINUE_CHECK_CONFIRM
string.body:
You have activated the automatic extension of the minion function. As soon as the function expires, it will automatically be extended by 30 days at next login and a fee will be payable.

But if you don't have enough Kinah it will be deactivated automatically.

string.name: STR_FAMILIAR_DIALOG_FFUNCTION_REFUND
string.body:
The minion function is paused. The Kinah for the remaining time will be returned to you. On confirmation, you receive 10%%%% of the fee back and no more than a total of %qina0.

string.name: STR_FAMILIAR_DIALOG_FFUNCTION_ICON_TOOLTIP
string.body:
Minion Function

Use Kinah to use minion functions. This function lets minions warn you when danger is near, they automatically pick items up for you and automatically use your food and magical items. You cannot use any special minion skills, however.

Minion Skills%0

Automatic linking of the skills of summoned minions. If you summon a minion, you can switch its %0 skill. You can view minion skills under information and set shortcut keys.

string.name: STR_INSTANCE_DUNGEON_PARTY_TOURNAMENT_DESC
string.body:
In this battle, 16 teams face off in 6 against 6 melees.

The battles take place in the Gold Arena and the winning team will progress.

As soon as there is a winner the battles will be ended and all teams will receive rewards matching the result.

string.name: STR_INSTANCE_DUNGEON_PARTY_EVENT_TOURNAMENT_DESC
string.body:
In this battle, 16 teams face off in 6 against 6 melees.

The battles take place in the Gold Arena and the winning team will progress.

As soon as there is a winner the battles will be ended and all teams will receive rewards matching the result.

string.name: STR_INSTANCE_DUNGEON_RELAY_TOURNAMENT_DESC
string.body:
In this battle, 16 teams face off in 1 against 1 melees.

The battles take place in the Gold Arena and the winning team will progress.

As soon as there is a winner the battles will be ended and all teams will receive rewards matching the result.

string.name: STR_LUNA_DICE_GOSSIP_03
string.body: You can only re-roll cubes that aren't showing the laughing Shugo.

string.name: STR_LUNA_DICE_REPEAT_CONDITION
string.body:
[Please note when re-rolling cubes]

1. If all 5 regular cubes show the laughing Shugo, then the game is over.

2. The game ends when you don't have enough Luna.

3. Each time you roll, the cost increases.

string.name: STR_LUNA_DICE_GETREWARD_CONFIRM
string.body:
Would you like the reward for this score?

Click Confirm to end the game and receive the reward for

your current level.

string.name: STR_INGAME_NSHOP_MSGBOX_DOWNLOAD_INQUIRE
string.body:
%1 will be downloaded into the %0 folder.

Do you want to continue?

string.name: STR_REGISTER_ITEM_REPLACE_DIALOG__DESC
string.body:
Please register the item for event evolution.

An item that meets the boost level and upgrade level requirements has to be registered along with the material item.

After evolution, Boost Level, Upgrade Level and Enchantment Information remain.

The higher the Boost Level or Upgrade Level, the less Material Items are required.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_PROC_TITLE_CANTUSE
string.body: Godstone Socketing is not possible afterwards.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_PREDICT_DECOMPOUND_WEAPON_CANTUSE
string.body: After undoing the fusion, fusion of %0 two-handed weapons is not possible

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_COMPOUNDED_WEAPON_TITLE_CANTUSE
string.body: Fusion of two-handed weapons not possible afterwards

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_PREDICT_REMOVE_OPTION_CANTUSE
string.body: After removing the Manastone, %0 Manastone enchantment is not possible

string.name: STR_CUSTOMIZING_GUIDE
string.body: (Attention) Appearances that do not match the current character, faction or gender will not be displayed in the list.

string.name: STR_LUNA_DICE_TOOLTIP
string.body: The cube game rewards range from simple to first class items.

string.name: STR_CUSTOMIZING_WATERMARK
string.body: This screenshot displays information about characters' appearances,\n which can be accessed via character settings.

string.name: STR_SOUL_BOUND_ITEM_DO_YOU_WANT_SOUL_BOUND_BELOW_LEGEND
string.body:
%itemid0% must be soulbound to equip it.

It is not possible to remove soul-binding from this item, which means it cannot be traded once it is soulbound.

Perform soul-binding now?

string.name: STR_FAMILIAR_TOOLTIP_FAMILIAR_POINTBAR
string.body:
Level-up Effect

The minion level increases once you have reached 50% or 100% Growth Points, depending on the blessing level. The level is indicated by the colours of the Growth Points and the growth level of the Wings symbol.

string.name: STR_STIGMA_SET_EFFECT_TOOLTIP_INFO
string.body: The set effect is activated once the buff levels of the equipped Stigmas meet the requirements.

string.name: STR_IDRUN_DESC_MATCH_DESC
string.body:
Elyos and Asmodians will face off for a limited time in this instance.

You win if you reach the target before the opposing faction does.

All enhancing effects are removed when entering the instance.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_PREDICT_CPSTONE_ITEM_ENCHANT_EVENT
string.body:
If upgrading fails, you will achieve Boost Level %0 → %2.

If successful, you will achieve Boost Level %0 → %1.

Power of Creation %3 → %4

•During the Estima Event, the All-Powerful Enchantment Stone is not destroyed if an upgrade fails, and instead the Boost Level is only reduced by 1.

string.name: STR_ITEM_ENCHANT_NOT_MATERIAL_POPUP
string.body:
You can use %0 Kinah to pay if you don't have enough Socketing Aids.

Do you want to pay Kinah for the buff?

string.name: STR_IDEvent_Def_point_tooltip
string.body: Can only be used on the Hell Pass.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_FORTRESS_SEQUENTIAL_OCCUPY_TIP
string.body: Occupied by the Balaur at the beginning of the fortress battle.

string.name: STR_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_OCCUPY_BODY_LIGHT2
string.body: \n\nYou will receive the following reward for your success in battle:

string.name: STR_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_OCCUPY_BODY_DARK2
string.body: \n\nYou will receive the following reward for your success in battle:

string.name: STR_STIGMA_MATTER_ENCHANT_CONFIRM
string.body:
Do you want to boost %1 using %0?

If the buff is successful, the level is randomly increased by 1 or 3.

In the event of a failure, the level is randomly reduced by 1 or left unchanged.

string.name: STR_RANK_MAIL_BODY_IDRUN_L
string.body: These are the rewards for your performance this season on the Treasure Island of Courage.

string.name: STR_RANK_MAIL_BODY_IDRUN_D
string.body: These are the rewards for your performance this season on the Treasure Island of Courage.

string.name: STR_FAMILIAR_DIALOG_FFUNCTION_ICON_TOOLTIP_ON_CHINA
string.body:
Minion Function

Use %0 to activate the minion functions. This function lets minions warn you when danger is near, they automatically pick items up for you and automatically use your food and magical items. This function is not available to special minions.

string.name: STR_FAMILIAR_DIALOG_FFUNCTION_USE_CONFIRM_INDEX_DESC_ON_CHINA
string.body:
Using the minion function for 30 days costs %0 %1. Once you have paid, all the minions you own can use this function (except special minions).

Do you want to continue?

string.name: STR_FAMILIAR_DIALOG_FFUNCTION_AUTOCONTINUE_CHECK_CONFIRM_ON_CHINA
string.body:
You have activated the automatic extension of the minion function. As soon as the function expires, it will automatically be extended by 30 days at next login and a fee will be payable.

If you don't have enough items it will be deactivated automatically.

string.name: STR_TOPPING_APBOOST_02_DESC
string.body: Movement speed increases by 1% and Abyss Points gained from defeating the opposing faction increase by 100%.

string.name: STR_TOPPING_APBOOST_SP_02_DESC
string.body: Movement speed increases by 1% and Abyss Points gained from defeating the opposing faction increase by 100%.

string.name: STR_UI_Gauge_Desc_IDEvent_Def_A
string.body: The remaining Pathway controllers will be displayed.

string.name: STR_UI_Gauge_Title_IDEvent_Def_B
string.body: Stability of the Last Barrier Entrance

string.name: STR_UI_Gauge_Desc_IDEvent_Def_B
string.body: The current stability of the Last Barrier Entrance is displayed.

string.body: Reward available for %0 hour(s) and %1 minute(s).

string.body: Reward available for %0 day(s), %1 hour(s) and %2 minute(s).

string.body: If unsuccessful, the level will be reset to %0.

string.body: Reward available for %0 day(s), %1 hour(s) and %2 minute(s).

string.body: Can only be used with Daeva Membership.

string.name: STR_UI_Gauge_Desc_IDInfinity_02
string.body: Shows which floor of the Tower of Challenge you are currently on.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_DESC_ENCHANT_PVE
string.body: •PvE Enchantment Stones can be used to increase the Boost Level of certain items. A higher Boost Level also increases the item's stats. The chance of success can be increased depending on the boost material used.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_DESC_ENCHANT_PVP
string.body: •PvP Enchantment Stones can be used to increase the Boost Level of certain items. A higher Boost Level also increases the item's stats. The chance of success can be increased depending on the boost material used.

string.body: •Please place the item for the PvE enchantment in the appropriate socket.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TARGET_ENCHANT_PVP
string.body: •Please place the item for the PvP enchantment into the appropriate buffing position.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TOOL_ENCHANT_PVE
string.body: •Please place the item to be used for the PvE boost into the appropriate buffing position.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TOOL_ENCHANT_PVP
string.body: •Please place the item to be used for the PvP boost into the appropriate buffing position.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_PREDICT_ENCHANT_COUNT2
string.body: If successful, you will achieve Boost Level %0 → %1 - %2.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_PREDICT_ENCHANT_WARNING2
string.body: If a strike misses, the boost level is reduced by 1.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_PREDICT_ENCHANT_WARNING_ABOVE2
string.body: If upgrading fails, the Boost Level will be reduced to level %0.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_DESC_ENCHANT_OPTIONSLOT_ADD
string.body: •You can expand the Manastone slot by using the Slot Stone on expandable items.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TARGET_ENCHANT_OPTIONSLOT_ADD
string.body: •Please place the item for the Manastone slot expansion in the appropriate socket.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TOOL_ENCHANT_OPTIONSLOT_ADD
string.body: •Please place the item to be used to buff the Manastone into the appropriate buffing position.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_PREDICT_ENCHANT_OPTIONSLOT_ADD
string.body:
•You can expand a Manastone slot for equipment.

•You can socket a Manastone after upgrading the Manastone slot.

•If successful, the number of Manastone slots is changed to %0 → %1.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_PREDICT_ENCHANT_OPTIONSLOT_ADD_WARNING
string.body: If an attempt fails, the Slot Stone used for the expansion is destroyed.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_SUCCEEDED_ENCHANT_OPTIONSLOT_ADD
string.body: Manastone slot expansion successful

string.name: STR_RESURRECT_QUNA_DESC
string.body: Use %quna0 %qunaname to restore your HP and MP. You are resurrected immediately.\nYou do not contract Soul Sickness. You can reset the amount via (holy) soul healing.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_FIRST_NOTICE
string.body:
Do you want to start the tutorial?

Caution: If you are attacked during the tutorial then you could suffer damage. Please move to a safe area before you begin the tutorial.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_END_NOTICE
string.body:
Do you want to end the tutorial?

Caution: The tutorial cannot be restarted once you end it. You can view the contents of the tutorial under [Campaign/Quest - Completed Quests].

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_PHY_POWER_BOOST
string.body: The ability to enhance a physical attack. The higher the number, the more powerful the physical attack.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_PVP_POWER_BOOST
string.body: The ability to enhance an attack on an opponent. The higher the number, the more powerful the attack on an opponent.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_PVE_POWER_BOOST
string.body: The ability to enhance an attack on a monster. The higher the number, the more powerful the attack on the monster.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_PVP_POWER_BOOST_RESIST
string.body: Defence against an enemy attack. The higher the number, the lower the power of an opponent's attack.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_PVE_POWER_BOOST_RESIST
string.body: Defence against a monster attack. The higher the number, the lower the power of an attack by a monster.

string.body: Manastone socketing (possible with a Manastone up to level %0)

string.name: STR_DEVAMEMVERSHIP_INVENTORY_SEELITEM_TOOLTIP
string.body: With a Daeva Membership you can get a %0%% higher price for your items in the inventory shop.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_GUIDE_SKILL_03
string.body: First click [Start] on the bottom right to open the menu.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_GUIDE_SKILL_04
string.body: Clicking on [Skills] will open the Skills window. You can check all of your skills here.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_GUIDE_SKILL_06
string.body: You can drag the skills in the Skills window to the Quickbar.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_SET_TITLE_03
string.body: First click [Start] on the bottom right to open the menu.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_SET_TITLE_04
string.body: Clicking on [Profile] will open the corresponding window. You can find a range of information here.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_SET_TITLE_05
string.body: Select the [Title] tab at the top of the window.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_SET_TITLE_06
string.body: Now find a title. The selected title now appears above your character's head.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_SET_TITLE_07
string.body: Then select the value of the title. Your skills will be increased according to the value of the title.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_SET_TITLE_08
string.body: This is how you use a title. Use this knowledge wisely.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USER_CHAIN_SKILL_03
string.body: First click [Start] on the bottom right to open the menu.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USER_CHAIN_SKILL_04
string.body: Clicking on [Skills] will open the Skills window. You can check all skills here.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USER_CHAIN_SKILL_05
string.body: Select the [Custom Chain Skills] tab at the top of the Skills window.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USER_CHAIN_SKILL_06
string.body: Skill that you register in this window will be used as chain skills.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USER_CHAIN_SKILL_07
string.body: Choose a skill and drag it into the socket for chain skills.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USER_CHAIN_SKILL_08
string.body: Register this skill in the first free socket for chain skills.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USER_CHAIN_SKILL_09
string.body: Then choose an additional skill and drag it into the socket for chain skills.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USER_CHAIN_SKILL_10
string.body: Register this skill in the second free socket for chain skills.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USER_CHAIN_SKILL_11
string.body: The chain skill that results can be registered in the Quickbar.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_UPGRADE_ITEM_03
string.body: First click [Start] on the bottom right to open the menu.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_UPGRADE_ITEM_04
string.body: Clicking on [Boost/Modify] will open the corresponding window.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_UPGRADE_ITEM_05
string.body: Now select an item in the cube to boost and drag it to the 'Boost/Modify' window.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_UPGRADE_ITEM_06
string.body: Now register the item in the equipment slot in the 'Boost/Modify' window.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_UPGRADE_ITEM_07
string.body: Then click on [Enhance PvE equipment] for an enhancement.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_UPGRADE_ITEM_08
string.body: Now select an Enchantment Stone in the cube and drag it to the 'Boost/Modify' window.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_UPGRADE_ITEM_09
string.body: Now register the item in the enhancement material socket in the 'Boost/Modify' window.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_UPGRADE_ITEM_10
string.body: Would you like to try? Click on [PvE Enchantment].

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_UPGRADE_ITEM_11
string.body: The enchantment will begin as soon as you click. Good luck!

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USE_EQQUIPMENT_SET_03
string.body: First click [Start] on the bottom right to open the menu.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USE_EQQUIPMENT_SET_04
string.body: Clicking on [Profile] will open the corresponding window. You can find a range of information here.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USE_EQQUIPMENT_SET_05
string.body: Select the [Info] tab at the top of the window.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USE_EQQUIPMENT_SET_06
string.body: Clicking on [Equipment Set settings] on the bottom of the Profile window will open the corresponding window.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USE_EQQUIPMENT_SET_08
string.body: Then click on [Current Equipment] in the window at the bottom to register your equipment.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USE_EQQUIPMENT_SET_09
string.body: Then click on [Save] to save your current equipment.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USE_EQQUIPMENT_SET_11
string.body: Choose a weapon from the cube and drag it into the socket for weapon 1 in the 'Equipment Set settings' window.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USE_EQQUIPMENT_SET_12
string.body: Now a second weapon is registered in the socket for weapon 1.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USE_EQQUIPMENT_SET_13
string.body: Click on [Save] again to save your current equipment.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USE_EQQUIPMENT_SET_14
string.body: If you have registered your saved equipment sets 1 and 2 in the Quickbar, you can switch equipment quickly at any time.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_MATTER_SLOT_OPEN_03
string.body: First click [Start] on the bottom right to open the menu.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_MATTER_SLOT_OPEN_04
string.body: Clicking on [Boost/Modify] will open the corresponding window.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_MATTER_SLOT_OPEN_05
string.body: Now select an item in the cube to expand the Manastone slot with and drag it to the 'Boost/Modify' window.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_MATTER_SLOT_OPEN_06
string.body: Now register the item in the equipment slot in the 'Boost/Modify' window.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_MATTER_SLOT_OPEN_07
string.body: Then click on [Expand Manastone slot] for an expansion.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_MATTER_SLOT_OPEN_08
string.body: If you have a Slot Stone in your cube, it will automatically be registered in the corresponding buffing position.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_MATTER_SLOT_OPEN_09
string.body: How about a slot expansion? Click on [Expand Manastone slot].

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_MATTER_SLOT_OPEN_10
string.body: The expansion will begin as soon as you click. Good luck!

string.name: STR_INSTANCE_QUNABUFF_TOOLTIP_DESC
string.body: The attribute effectiveness increases by 10% (depending on the entry level).

string.name: STR_INSTANCE_QUNABUFF_TOOLTIP_TITLE
string.body:
%qunanamemonerk Cheer

Your abilities will be enhanced by the %qunanamemonerk Cheer. The effect vanishes as soon as you leave the instance.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_UPGRADE_ITEM_12
string.body: So, the enchantment is now completed. Click [OK] and check the result.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_MATTER_SLOT_OPEN_11
string.body: So, the Manastone slot expansion is now completed. Click [OK] and check the result.

string.name: STR_INSTANCE_QUNABUFF_CONFIRM
string.body: Do you want to use %quna0 %qunaname for a buff?

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_SUCCEEDED_REMOVE_SKIN_CHANGE_VENDOR

string.body: •You receive a Slot Stone when you extract PvE equipment. You also receive a Fighting Spirit Fragment for extracting PvP equipment.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_PREDICT_SKIN_CHANGE_CAN_VENDOR
string.body: Can be sold via a Trade Broker after changing the appearance

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_SUCCEEDED_SKIN_CHANGE_CAN_VENDOR
string.body: Can be sold via a Trade Broker

string.body: This purchase is only possible %0 times per day.

string.name: STR_QUNAMARKET_OFFER_LIMIT_WEEKLY
string.body: This purchase is only possible %0 times per week.

string.name: STR_QUNAMARKET_OFFER_LIMIT_MONTHLY
string.body: This purchase is only possible %0 times per month.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_ITEM_UPGRADE_ENCHANT_PVE_PVP
string.body: Upgrade (possible from PvE enchantment level %0 and PvP enchantment level %1)

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_ITEM_REPLACE_ENCHANT_PVE
string.body: Event levelling (possible from PvE enchantment level %0)

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_ITEM_REPLACE_ENCHANT_PVP
string.body: Event levelling (possible from PvP enchantment level %0)

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_ITEM_REPLACE_ENCHANT_PVE_PVP
string.body: Event levelling (possible from PvE enchantment level %0 and PvP enchantment level %1)

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_GUIDE_SKILL_02
string.body: Today we'll be checking the skills you've acquired and you'll learn how you can use them.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_GUIDE_SKILL_07
string.body: Try again. First open the [Start menu] and then [Skills].

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_GUIDE_SKILL_08
string.body: You can drag the skills in the Skills window to the Quickbar.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_GUIDE_SKILL_09
string.body: So, now things are getting serious. Use your skills to advance yourself. May the tide of war go with you.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_SET_TITLE_01
string.body: You've made astounding progress! Are you ready to learn something new?

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_SET_TITLE_02
string.body: Today, I'll teach you how you can wear titles. Follow me!

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_SET_TITLE_09
string.body: Let me summarise again: click on [Profile] in the menu and select the [Title] tab.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_SET_TITLE_10
string.body: Find a title and the respective value and wear it.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_SET_TITLE_11
string.body: I hope you this information helps you! See you soon.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USER_CHAIN_SKILL_02
string.body: Now the time has come for me to share with you my knowledge of adjustable skills.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USER_CHAIN_SKILL_12
string.body: It sounds complicate but it'll work with a bit of training.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USER_CHAIN_SKILL_13
string.body: Used cunningly, adjustable skills can be a big help.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USER_CHAIN_SKILL_14
string.body: I hope that this knowledge will be of great use to you in your development.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_UPGRADE_ITEM_01
string.body: There you are! Today, I'll teach you how you can further advance your equipment.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_UPGRADE_ITEM_02
string.body: Equipment can be enhanced by enchanting. Listen to me carefully and follow my instructions.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_UPGRADE_ITEM_13
string.body: The performance is improved if the equipment enchantment is successful, worsened if it fails.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_UPGRADE_ITEM_14
string.body: The success rate depends on the Enchantment Stone used. So I recommend that you use a high-quality stone.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_UPGRADE_ITEM_15
string.body: I wish you every success with the enchantment.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_MATTER_SLOT_OPEN_01
string.body: Welcome! Did you know that you can use Manastones to enhance a piece of equipment's attributes?

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_MATTER_SLOT_OPEN_02
string.body: Today, I'll show you how to expand the Manastone socketing for equipment.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_MATTER_SLOT_OPEN_12
string.body: A good Daeva doesn't rely on their equipment. But well chosen equipment makes a good Daeva even better.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_MATTER_SLOT_OPEN_13
string.body: As soon as the socket has been expanded, you can use more Manastones to enhance your skills.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_MATTER_SLOT_OPEN_14
string.body: Let this knowledge guide you to success.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USE_EQQUIPMENT_SET_01
string.body: It's been a while! Congratulations on your extraordinary development!

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USE_EQQUIPMENT_SET_02
string.body: I'm sure you've collected lots of pieces of equipment. Today, I'll teach you about using equipment sets.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USE_EQQUIPMENT_SET_15
string.body: Don't you think it's time to be able to switch between equipment with different effects depending on the opponent?

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USE_EQQUIPMENT_SET_16
string.body: This function will help you to prepare your equipment sets for a situation like this.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USE_EQQUIPMENT_SET_17
string.body: I wish you success, as always! We shall meet again.

string.name: STR_ERR_CANT_EXECUTE_MORE_GAME_CLIENT_2
string.body: You can only operate one client. End game.

string.name: STR_QUNAMARKET_BUTTON_CUSTOMIZING_DIMMEDTOOLTIP
string.body: Can only be used in a city (Sanctum/Pandaemonium).

string.name: STR_QUNAMARKET_BUTTON_BUY_DIMMEDTOOLTIP
string.body: You have purchased the maximum amount.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_GUIDE_SKILL_05
string.body: Select the [Active] tab at the top of the Skills window.

string.name: STR_INGAME_MARKET_NOTUSE_FLYPASS
string.body: You cannot use the warehouse in your current state.

string.body: You cannot make purchases when using gliders or wind streams.
