string.body: You cannot make the purchase while the item is activated.

string.name: STR_INGAME_MARKET_NOTBUY_INSTANCE
string.body: You cannot make the purchase on this server.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_DESC_REIDENTIFY_QINA
string.body: •Options and stats will be enhanced again.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_DESC_REIDENTIFY_QUNA
string.body: •The selected options will be enhanced again.

string.name: STR_INDUN_ITEM_INFO_IDETERNITY_02
string.body: Ancient weapons, armour, accessories, feathers/ancient PvE Enchantment Stone

string.name: STR_INDUN_ITEM_INFO_IDAB1_HEROES_L
string.body: Ancient Weapons, Armour, Accessories, Feathers/Legendary Shoulder Gear, Fist Guards, Belts

string.name: STR_INDUN_ITEM_INFO_IDAB1_HEROES_D
string.body: Ancient Weapons, Armour, Accessories, Feathers/Legendary Shoulder Gear, Fist Guards, Belts

string.name: STR_INDUN_ITEM_INFO_IDF7_WEAPON
string.body: Ancient And Legendary Armour, Feathers/Ultimate Shoulder Gear, Fist Guards

string.name: STR_INDUN_ITEM_INFO_IDSEAL
string.body: Ancient and Legendary Weapons, Accessories/Ultimate Leg Protectors, Foot Protectors

string.name: STR_RANK_MAIL_BODY_PARTY_L
string.body: You receive a reward because you achieved excellent results in the Arena of Cooperation this season.

string.name: STR_RANK_MAIL_BODY_PARTY_D
string.body: You receive a reward because you achieved excellent results in the Arena of Cooperation this season.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_REIDENTIFY_QUNA_CONFIRM
string.body:
Do you want to use %quna0 %qunaname for a re-identification?

Will be used immediately once you click Confirm. Cannot be undone.

string.name: STR_FAMILIAR_COMPOSE_UI_INFO
string.body: A fusion is only possible if you have four minions at evolution level 4.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_Cubic_01
string.body: You received a very rare item.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_Cubic_02
string.body: A material that lets you turn the cubelets made by a Shugo into a cube.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_Cubic_03
string.body: Now I'll show you how to register cubelets and turn them into a cube.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_Cubic_04
string.body: First click [Start] on the bottom right to open the menu.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_Cubic_05
string.body: Clicking on [Cube] will open the Cube window. You can register and manage your cubes here.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_Cubic_06
string.body: You have a Life Cubelet. Click on [Life Cube].

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_Cubic_07
string.body: There are various classes of cubes. Every cube is made of multiple cubelets.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_Cubic_08
string.body: Next, find a cube from the cube list.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_Cubic_09
string.body: If you have a cubelet that can be registered then click on [Register].

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_Cubic_10
string.body: The registered cubelets will be compiled into a cube that enhances your skills.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_Cubic_11
string.body: You can use the [Bulk registration] button to register all your cubelets in one go.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_Cubic_12
string.body: In short, a cube is a Shugo invention that improves the user's skills.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_Cubic_13
string.body: This is created by registering cubelets in the cube window.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_Cubic_14
string.body: Here endeth the lesson. Use this wisdom with care!

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_ATTEMPTED_FRAUD_180_DAYS
string.body:
Your account has been locked for 180 days for attempted fraud or harassment.

You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_FRAUD_PERMANENT
string.body:
Your account has been permanently locked for attempted fraud or illegal conduct.

You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_ZONE_COMMENT_IDDREADGION_04_REWARD_DESC
string.body:
This is the Ashunatal Dredgion. Keep the opposing faction in check and kill Captain Ashunatal.

Main rewards include 'Legendary and Ultimate Etium' and 'Bundle of PvP Enchantment Stones', etc.

string.name: STR_IDLDF5_FORTRESS_RE_MATCH_REWARD_DESC
string.body:
Elyos and Asmodians will face off for a fixed time in this instance. You win if you gain more points than the opposing faction. All enhancing effects are removed when entering the instance.

Main rewards include 'Legendary and Ultimate Etium' and 'Bundle of PvP Enchantment Stones', etc.

string.name: STR_IDETERNITY_WAR_REWARD_DESC
string.body:
You win if you use the landing site and gain more points than the opposing faction. All enhancing effects are removed when entering the instance.

Main rewards include 'Legendary and Ultimate Etium' and 'Bundle of PvP Enchantment Stones', etc.

string.name: STR_INDUN_ITEM_INFO_IDF7_Ere
string.body: Legendary And Ultimate Weapons, Armour, Wings

string.name: STR_IDBattle_Change_MATCH_REWARD_DESC
string.body:
A transformation has temporarily resulted in a battle in the Instance. Achieve more points than the opposing faction or destroy the opponent's Icon to win. All enhancing effects are removed when entering the instance.

Main rewards include 'Legendary Etium' and 'Bundle of PvP Enchantment Stones', etc.

string.name: STR_STIGMA_CONFIRM_DIRECT_EQUIP
string.body: To equip this Stigma Stone, you require <font font_xml="v3_msgbox_money">%qina0</font>. If you equip it without the help of a Stigma Master, this Stigma skill will last for 5 minutes. cannot be used. Are you sure you want to equip it?

string.name: STR_TRANSFORMATION_COLLECTION_CONDITION_GRADE
string.body: Collect %1 %0 grade transformations of each type.

string.name: STR_TRANSFORMATION_COLLECTION_CONDITION_TOTAL
string.body: Gather fusion material of any class %0 times.

string.name: STR_TransCollection_016
string.body: A Schemer Vanished in a Flash

string.name: STR_UI_Gauge_Desc_idf7_ere_A
string.body: The mission to rescue the Special Vanguard in Senekta is under way.

string.name: STR_UI_Gauge_Desc_idf7_ere_B
string.body: The mission to rescue the Jotuns in Senekta is under way.

string.name: STR_UI_Gauge_Desc_idf7_ere_C
string.body: The mission to travel by Petralith in Senekta is under way.

string.name: STR_XIGNCODE_KICK
string.body: Could not find XIGNCODE3. XIGNCODE3 needs to be running to be able to play AION.

string.name: STR_MTALK_RECEIVE_PHOTO
string.body: You received a picture in M Talk.

string.name: STR_MTALK_RECEIVE_IMOTICON
string.body: An emoticon was received in M Talk.

string.name: STR_MTALK_RECEIVE_MESSAGE
string.body: You received a message in M Talk.

string.name: STR_Topping_Mtalk_speed_DESC
string.body: Your Movement Speed is increased by 7%.

string.name: STR_DEVANIONSKILLENCHANT_REINFORCE_SLOT_TARGET_TOOLTIP
string.body:
Target to enchant

Register a Daevanion skill to be enchanted.

string.name: STR_DEVANIONSKILLENCHANT_REINFORCE_SLOT_MATERIALORIGINAL_TOOLTIP
string.body:
Enchantment material

You can enchant a skill with Daevanion Skill Books.

string.name: STR_DEVANIONSKILLENCHANT_REINFORCE_SLOT_MATERIALSPECIAL_TOOLTIP
string.body:
Special materials

You can register items that are helpful for the enchantment.

string.name: STR_DEVANIONSKILLENCHANT_COMPOSE_SLOT_TARGET_TOOLTIP
string.body:
Fusion result

You can view the fusion result for the Daevanion Skill Book.

string.name: STR_DEVANIONSKILLENCHANT_COMPOSE_SLOT_MATERIALORIGINAL_TOOLTIP
string.body:
Fusion Material

You can fuse Daevanion Skill Books.

string.name: STR_DEVANIONSKILLENCHANT_REINFORCE_INFO
string.body: ● From enchantment level 10, the enchantment level will be reset to level 10 if the enchantment fails. ● Only legendary Daevanion skills or higher can be enchanted. ● If the Daevanion Skill Book used is identical to the target to enchant, there is a higher chance that the enchantment will be successful. ● Use special materials for the enchantment to stop the enchantment level being reduced. ● Items used for the enchantment will be consumed. ● There is a certain chance the enchantment will fail. ● You cannot select any settings for the Daevanion skill while the Identify Daevanion skills window is open.

string.name: STR_DEVANIONSKILLENCHANT_COMPOSE_INFO
string.body: ● Only ancient Daevanion Skill Books or higher can be fused. ● A total of 4 Daevanion Skill Books are required. ● There is a certain probability you will achieve a higher class. ● Items used for the fusion will be consumed.

string.name: STR_TRANSFORMATION_COLLECTION_INFO_NONE
string.body: There is no used collection attribute.

string.name: STR_INSTANCE_DUNGEON_PARTY_3vs3_TOURNAMENT_DESC
string.body:
In this battle, 8 teams face off in 3 against 3 melees.

The battles take place in the Gold Arena and the winning team will progress.

As soon as there is a winner the battles will be ended and all teams will receive rewards matching the result.

string.name: STR_TransCollection_029
string.body: We are one, though we are not the same.

string.name: STR_TransCollection_031
string.body: Another Pixel after 100 days of prayer.

string.name: STR_TransCollection_032
string.body: Welcome! You don't know Hanbok yet, right?

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_NBATTERY_ITEM_1
string.body: Enter. Did you know that you can use shards to increase the damage from skills?

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_NBATTERY_ITEM_2
string.body: Today, I'll show you how to increase the damage from skills.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_NBATTERY_ITEM_3
string.body: First click [Start] on the bottom right to open the menu.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_NBATTERY_ITEM_4
string.body: Click on [Profile] in the menu and open the window containing the character information.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_NBATTERY_ITEM_6
string.body: Select a shard in the cube and register the item in the shard socketing section of your profile.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_NBATTERY_ITEM_7
string.body: The shard is now registered. But it is not yet activated.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_NBATTERY_ITEM_8
string.body: Depending on your opponent, you may need more skill damage at times.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_NBATTERY_ITEM_9
string.body: If this is the case, you can click the [Shard Activation Button] in the lower left corner of the screen to activate the shard.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_PARTY_INSTANCE_LIST_2
string.body: This time I will explain to you how to apply to join a Group Instance. Listen to me carefully and follow my instructions.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_PARTY_INSTANCE_LIST_3
string.body: First click Start on the bottom right to open the menu.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_PARTY_INSTANCE_LIST_4
string.body: The Instance Info window opens if you click on Instance Info.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_PARTY_INSTANCE_LIST_5
string.body: Look at the information about the instance.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_PARTY_INSTANCE_LIST_6
string.body: Let this knowledge guide you to success.

string.name: STR_DAILYMISSION_COMPLETE_SEC_TIME
string.body: Reward available for less than 1 minute.

string.name: STR_MISSION_01_DESC
string.body:
Dictionary testEnd Tutorial 90000.

TIP: Mission to test deactivation.

string.name: STR_MISSION_02_DESC
string.body:
End any tutorial.

TIP: Mission for time management.

string.name: STR_MISSION_03_DESC
string.body:
Hunt for Verdant Grankers.

TIP: Mission for Wednesday test.

string.name: STR_MISSION_04_TITLE
string.body: <font color="fa9dd6">[Mark]</font> Hunt - hunt a pair of monsters

string.name: STR_MISSION_04_DESC
string.body:
Hunt for Colourful Bloodwing, Blue-horned Largon, Verdant Grankers and Wandering Kerubs.

TIP: Mission for Elyos test.Dictionary test

string.name: STR_MISSION_05_DESC
string.body:
Enter Lakrum.

TIP: Mission to test level classification (16-20).

string.name: STR_MISSION_06_TITLE
string.body: <font color="fa9dd6">[Mark]</font> EnterWorld - enter the field a few times.

string.name: STR_MISSION_06_DESC
string.body:
Enter Poeta or Ishalgen.

TIP: Mission to test whether reward quantity is exceeded (1).

string.name: STR_MISSION_07_TITLE
string.body: [Special] Collect a Daevanion Skill Chest or a Legendary Daevanion Skill Chest once.

string.name: STR_MISSION_07_DESC
string.body:
Collect Daevanion Skill Chests (6 types) or Legendary Daevanion Skill Chests.

TIP: Mission to test the update frequency (0).

string.name: STR_MISSION_08_DESC
string.body:
Collect 162005004-162005007 Serum.

TIP: Mission to test the update frequency (2).

string.name: STR_MISSION_09_TITLE
string.body: [Special] Use a Greater Recovery Serum or a Premium Recovery Serum once

string.name: STR_MISSION_09_DESC
string.body:
Use a Greater Recovery Serum or a Premium Recovery Serum once.

TIPP: Mission to test the crafting points (0).

string.name: STR_MISSION_10_DESC
string.body:
Use 162005004-162005007 Serum.

TIP: Mission to test the crafting points (2).

string.name: STR_MISSION_12_DESC
string.body: Use 190099001 trans_scroll_transparent_01: Transparency Transformation Scroll. Check if it can also be used for minions (and test sentence length).

string.name: STR_V70_SKILL_TOOLTIP_UI_TARGET_TARGET_AREA
string.body: Area within a Radius of Target

string.name: STR_FINAL_MISSION_01_DESC
string.body: Complete mission <font color="fd8548">3</font> to receive the final reward!

string.name: STR_MISSION_13_TITLE
string.body: [Mark] Hunt: Hunt a Draconute Raider and a Verdant Granker

string.name: STR_MISSION_13_DESC
string.body: Hunt a Draconute Raider and a Verdant Granker as part of an alliance.

string.name: STR_MISSION_14_TITLE
string.body: <font color="fa9dd6">[Mark]</font> Hunt: Hunt a Draconute Raider and a Verdant Granker

string.name: STR_MISSION_14_DESC
string.body: Test for multiple marking of a monster with the power marking method: capture a Draconute Raider or a Verdant Granker.

string.name: STR_MISSION_15_TITLE
string.body: [Special] Collect a Daevanion Skill Chest or a Legendary Daevanion Skill Chest 1 time.

string.name: STR_MISSION_15_DESC
string.body: Collect Daevanion Skill Chests (6 types) or Legendary Daevanion Skill Chests as part of an alliance.

string.name: STR_MISSION_16_DESC
string.body: Collect 162005004-162005007 Serum as part of an alliance.

string.name: STR_MISSION_17_DESC
string.body: Destroy the enemy faction as part of an alliance.

string.name: STR_DAILYMISSION_BANNER_DAILY1
string.body: That's a daily mission for Daevas. Carry out a new mission every day to win fantastic rewards!

string.name: STR_DAILYMISSION_BANNER_WEEKLY1
string.body: This is a weekly mission that's pretty tricky. But the reward will be suitably large!

string.name: STR_DAILYMISSION_BANNER_DAILY2
string.body: Get started with a simple task!

string.name: STR_DAILYMISSION_BANNER_WEEKLY2
string.body: It's probably way too easy for a Daeva genius like you!

string.name: STR_DAILYMISSION_BANNER_DAILY3
string.body: You want to know who Lugbug is? Me of course, haha! I have prepared missions for Daevas!

string.name: STR_DAILYMISSION_BANNER_WEEKLY3
string.body: I'm sure you'll manage it, Daeva Just try a little harder!

string.name: STR_DAILYMISSION_BANNER_DAILY4
string.body: That's a daily mission for Daevas. Carry out a new mission every day to win fantastic rewards!

string.name: STR_DAILYMISSION_BANNER_WEEKLY4
string.body: This is a weekly mission that's pretty tricky. But the reward will be suitably large!

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_QUNAMARKET_02
string.body: Now the time has come for me to share with you my knowledge of Luna Market.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_QUNAMARKET_03
string.body: Next, click on [Luna Market] at the bottom right to open Luna Market.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_QUNAMARKET_04
string.body: You will find recommended items and the product of the day under the [Home] tab.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_QUNAMARKET_05
string.body: Remember that the product of the day is replaced by another items after a certain period of time.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_QUNAMARKET_06
string.body: Now select the [Functions] tab in Luna Market.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_QUNAMARKET_07
string.body: Functional items are sold under the [Functions] tab. Look to see if there's anything you can use.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_QUNAMARKET_08
string.body: Now select the [Outfit] tab in the [Luna Market] tab.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_QUNAMARKET_09
string.body: Under the [Outfit] tab you can use Luna to buy robes, hairstyles, wings and movements/emotes.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_QUNAMARKET_10
string.body: To finish, select the [Event] tab under the [Luna Market] tab.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_QUNAMARKET_11
string.body: You will find event items under the [Event] tab.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_QUNAMARKET_12
string.body: Here endeth the lesson. Use this wisdom with care!

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_QUNAMARKET_13
string.body: You will find recommended items and the product of the day under the [Home] tab.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_QUNAMARKET_14
string.body: Remember that the product of the day is replaced by another items after a certain period of time.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_QUNAMARKET_15
string.body: Now select the [Functions] tab in Luna Market.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_QUNAMARKET_16
string.body: Various functional items are sold under the [Functions] tab. Look to see if there's anything you can use.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_QUNAMARKET_17
string.body: Now select the [Outfit] tab in the [Luna Market] tab.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_QUNAMARKET_18
string.body: Under the [Outfit] tab you can use Luna to buy various robes, hairstyles, wings and movements/emotes.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_QUNAMARKET_19
string.body: To finish, select the [Event] tab under the [Luna Market] tab.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_QUNAMARKET_20
string.body: You will find event items under the [Event] tab.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_QUNAMARKET_21
string.body: Here endeth the lesson. Use this wisdom with care!

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_TRANSFORMATION_01
string.body: Enter. Now the time has come for me to share with you my knowledge of transformations.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_TRANSFORMATION_02
string.body: First click [Start] on the bottom right to open the menu.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_TRANSFORMATION_03
string.body: Click on [Transformation] to open the corresponding window. Here you will find all the information about transformations.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_TRANSFORMATION_04
string.body: You can see a summary of the transformation in the [Profile] tab currently displayed.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_TRANSFORMATION_05
string.body: Now select the [Collection] tab under the [Transformation] tab.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_TRANSFORMATION_06
string.body: You can apply and receive various additional effects according to the list of collected transformations under the [Collection] tab.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_TRANSFORMATION_07
string.body: Next, select the [Contract] tab under the [Transformation] tab.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_TRANSFORMATION_08
string.body: You can use transformation contracts and receive various transformations under the [Contract] tab.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_TRANSFORMATION_09
string.body: Now select the [Fusion] tab under the [Transformation] tab.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_TRANSFORMATION_10
string.body: You can merge duplicate transformations under the [Fusion] tab.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_TRANSFORMATION_11
string.body: To finish, select the [List] tab under the [Transformation] tab.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_TRANSFORMATION_12
string.body: Under the [List] tab you can see a transformation list and a list of the transformations that you own.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_TRANSFORMATION_13
string.body: Here endeth the lesson. Use this wisdom with care!

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_POSITION_NEXT_SPECIAL
string.body: * The next Altar Siege Battle involves an altar that receives Apsu's blessing.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_APPCENTER_01
string.body: Congratulations on your extraordinary development! Now the time has come for me to share with you my knowledge of AION Home.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_APPCENTER_02
string.body: Click on [AION Home] in the bottom right to open AION Home.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_APPCENTER_03
string.body: Click on [App Center] to open the corresponding window.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_APPCENTER_04
string.body: Here you will find information about your messages, your character, your legion, the Daeva plan, the community and the user guide.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_NBATTERY_ITEM_10
string.body: Let this knowledge guide you to success.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_GOLDSAND_02
string.body: Now the time has come for me to share with you my knowledge of the Gold Sand shop.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_GOLDSAND_03
string.body: Click on [Gold Sand shop] on the lower right to open the Gold Sand shop.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_GOLDSAND_04
string.body: The [Kinah] tab shows items that you can purchase with Kinah.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_GOLDSAND_05
string.body: Remember that time restrictions may apply to the purchase of some items.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_GOLDSAND_06
string.body: Now select the [Outfit] tab in the Gold Sand shop.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_GOLDSAND_07
string.body: Under the [Outfit] tab, you can use Kinah to buy various items such as robes, hair accessories and wings to change your appearance.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_GOLDSAND_08
string.body: When making a purchase, first ensure that you can select the items and put them on.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_GOLDSAND_09
string.body: Now select the [Gold Ingots] tab under the [Gold Sand shop] tab.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_GOLDSAND_10
string.body: The [Gold Ingots] tab shows items that you can purchase with Gold Ingots.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_GOLDSAND_11
string.body: Remember that time restrictions may apply to the purchase of some items.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_GOLDSAND_12
string.body: Here endeth the lesson. Use this wisdom with care!

string.name: STR_UI_Gauge_Desc_IDAb1_MiniCastle_A
string.body: You must kill the protector who took the artefact and remove the barrier at the gate.

string.name: STR_UI_Gauge_Desc_IDAb1_MiniCastle_B
string.body: You must take a seat on the siege weapon and destroy the castle gate.

string.name: STR_UI_Gauge_Desc_IDAb1_MiniCastle_C
string.body: You must take a seat on the siege weapon and kill the Guardian General.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_APPCENTER_05
string.body: Here endeth the lesson. Use this wisdom with care!

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Collect_v70_01
string.body: [Universal] I want some nourishing Shura goods!

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Collect_v70_01_DESC
string.body: Buy goods once at Luna Market.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Collect_v70_02
string.body: [Universal] I want some special Lunamon goods!

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Collect_v70_02_DESC
string.body: Buy goods three times at Luna Market.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Collect_v70_03_DESC
string.body:
Receive Leibo Jam once.

TIP: You can get this item as a [Final Daily Reward] for a [Daily Mission].

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Collect_v70_04_DESC
string.body:
Receive Leibo Jam twice.

TIP: You can get this item as a [Final Daily Reward] for a [Daily Mission].

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Collect_v70_05_DESC
string.body:
Receive Leibo Jam three times.

TIP: You can get this item as a [Final Daily Reward] for a [Daily Mission].

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Collect_v70_06_DESC
string.body:
Receive Leibo Jam four times.

TIP: You can get this item as a [Final Daily Reward] for a [Daily Mission].

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Collect_v70_07_DESC
string.body:
Receive Leibo Jam five times.

TIP: You can get this item as a [Final Daily Reward] for a [Daily Mission].

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Collect_v70_08_DESC
string.body:
Receive Leibo Jam six times.

TIP: You can get this item as a [Final Daily Reward] for a [Daily Mission].

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Collect_v70_09_DESC
string.body:
Receive Leibo Jam seven times.

TIP: You can get this item as a [Final Daily Reward] for a [Daily Mission].

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Collect_v70_11_DESC
string.body:
Collect 50 Slot Stones or Fighting Spirit Fragments.

TIP: Can be obtained through [Boost/Modify] - [Equipment Extraction].

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Collect_v70_13_DESC
string.body:
Craft 1

Leibo Soul.

TIP: Can be crafted using [Action/Function] - [Profession] - [Substance Transformation].

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Enter_v70_02_DESC
string.body: Switch to a field three times.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Enter_v70_05_DESC
string.body:
Enter the Arena of Discipline or the Arena of Cooperation once.

TIP: You can only enter the Arena of Discipline and the Arena of Cooperation at certain times.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Hunt_v70_01_DESC
string.body:
Kill 10 monsters in the field.

TIP: This does not apply if the level of the target is more than 5 levels lower than your character.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Hunt_v70_02_DESC
string.body:
Kill 30 monsters in the field.

TIP: This does not apply if the level of the target is more than 5 levels lower than your character.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Hunt_v70_03_DESC
string.body:
Kill 50 monsters in the field.

TIP: This does not apply if the level of the target is more than 5 levels lower than your character.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Hunt_v70_04_DESC
string.body:
Kill 300 monsters in the field or in an instance.

TIP: This does not apply if the level of the target is more than 5 levels lower than your character.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_ItemPlay_v70_01_DESC
string.body:
Use food, a potion or a drink 10 times.

TIP: Can also be used with the minion's [Buff Master] function.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_ItemPlay_v70_02_DESC
string.body:
Use food, a potion or a drink 20 times.

TIP: Can also be used with the minion's [Buff Master] function.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_ItemPlay_v70_03_DESC
string.body:
Use a transformation scroll or a transformation potion 10 times.

TIP: Can also be used with the minion's [Buff Master] function.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_ItemPlay_v70_04_DESC
string.body: Use an Enchantment Stone to enchant equipment once.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_ItemPlay_v70_05_DESC
string.body: Use an Enchantment Stone to enchant equipment 5 times.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_PvP_V70_01_DESC
string.body:
Complete 5 PvP battles.

TIP: This does not apply if the level of the target is more than 5 levels lower than your character.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_PvP_V70_02_DESC
string.body:
Complete 10 PvP battles.

TIP: This does not apply if the level of the target is more than 5 levels lower than your character.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_PvP_V70_03_DESC
string.body:
Complete 30 PvP battles.

TIP: This does not apply if the level of the target is more than 5 levels lower than your character.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_PvP_V70_04_DESC
string.body:
Complete 60 PvP battles.

TIP: This does not apply if the level of the target is more than 5 levels lower than your character.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_PvP_V70_05_DESC
string.body:
Complete 100 PvP battles.

TIP: This does not apply if the level of the target is more than 5 levels lower than your character.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Quest_v70_01_DESC
string.body:
Complete 3 quests.

TIP: this does not apply to Event Quests.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Quest_v70_02_DESC
string.body:
Complete 5 quests.

TIP: this does not apply to Event Quests.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Quest_v70_03_DESC
string.body:
Complete 10 quests.

TIP: this does not apply to Event Quests.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Quest_v70_04_DESC
string.body: Complete 3 quests with a battle for Lakrum Garrison.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Quest_v70_05
string.body: [Instance] You sometimes need to leave the field

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Quest_v70_07
string.body: [Instance] You sometimes need to leave the field

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Quest_v70_11_DESC
string.body:
Complete 3 Dumaha Altar Siege quests.

TIP: Can be started with the governor of the altar siege Medena or Nulla.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Quest_v70_12
string.body: [Fortress Battle] Proof of the courageous fighter

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Quest_v70_12_DESC
string.body:
Complete 2 of Lugbug's fortress battle quests.

Tip: You receive Lugbug's fortress battle quests automatically when you capture the Divine Fortress, Lakrum Fortress or Dumaha Fortress.

string.name: STR_Daily_DESC_Normal
string.body: If you complete a set mission often enough, you will receive a final reward.

string.name: STR_Weekly_DESC_Normal
string.body: If you complete a set mission often enough, you will receive a final reward.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Hunt_v70_05_DESC
string.body:
Kill 1 boss monster in an instance.

TIP: This does not apply if the level of the target is more than 5 levels lower than your character.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Hunt_v70_06_DESC
string.body:
Kill 5 boss monsters in an instance.

TIP: This does not apply if the level of the target is more than 5 levels lower than your character.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Hunt_v70_07_DESC
string.body:
Kill 1 boss monster in an instance.

TIP: This only applies to boss monsters of instances for 1-6 people with level 76+.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Hunt_v70_08_DESC
string.body:
Kill 3 boss monsters in an instance.

TIP: This only applies to boss monsters of instances for 1-6 people with level 76+.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Hunt_v70_09_DESC
string.body:
Kill 10 boss monsters in an instance.

TIP: This only applies to boss monsters of instances for 1-6 people with level 76+.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Hunt_v70_10_DESC
string.body:
Kill 10 monsters in the fortress.

TIP: Starting from 7:30 PM, a Legion Advance Corridor leading to the fortress will appear in Lakrum.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Collect_v70_14_DESC
string.body:
Collect 30 cubelets.

TIP: Available in the field, the battlefield, the instance and the tower.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Collect_v70_15_DESC
string.body:
Collect 1 Kisk.

TIP: Can be obtained from various merchants.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Collect_v70_16_DESC
string.body:
Use the Titania Collector to collect 10 Titania Ore.

Tip: Titania Ore can be used for magical armour crafting.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Collect_v70_17_DESC
string.body: Collect 1 PvP Enchantment Stone or PvE Enchantment Stone.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Enter_v70_06_DESC
string.body:
Enter the Tower of Challenge once.

TIP: You can enter the Tower of Challenge through the lobby of the Empyrean Crucible.

string.name: STR_INDUN_ITEM_INFO_IDDF2_Dflame
string.body: Ancient and Legendary Weapons and Armour/Ancient PvE Enchantment Stones

string.name: STR_INDUN_ITEM_INFO_IDF4Re_Drana
string.body: Ancient and Legendary Weapons and Armour/Ancient PvE Enchantment Stones

string.name: STR_INDUN_ITEM_INFO_IDCatacombs
string.body: Ancient and Legendary Weapons and Armour/Ancient PvE Enchantment Stones

string.name: STR_INDUN_ITEM_INFO_IDYun
string.body: Ancient and Legendary Weapons and Armour/Ancient PvE Enchantment Stones

string.name: STR_INDUN_ITEM_INFO_IDTiamat_1
string.body: Ancient and Legendary Weapons, Armour, Accessories and Feathers/Ancient PvE Enchantment Stones

string.name: STR_INDUN_ITEM_INFO_IDLDF8_LAB
string.body: Legendary and Ultimate Armour, Feathers/Ancient PvE Enchantment Stones, Legendary PvE Enchantment Stones

string.name: STR_INDUN_ITEM_INFO_IDLDF8_LAB_E
string.body: Ancient and Legendary Armour, Feathers/Ultimate Jackets, Hair/Ancient PvE Enchantment Stones and Legendary PvE Enchantment Stones

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Hunt_v70_11_DESC
string.body:
Destroy Surkana on the Ashunatal Dredgion 3 times.

Tip: You can only enter the Ashunatal Dredgion at certain times.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Hunt_v70_12_DESC
string.body:
Defeat the Illusory Kunax in Illumiel 1 time.

Tip: A Guardian Siege Tank appears when you have defeated the Illusory Kunax.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Hunt_v70_13_DESC
string.body:
Defeat the Illusory Kunax in Illumiel 1 time.

Tip: An Archon Siege Tank appears when you have defeated the Illusory Kunax.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Hunt_v70_14_DESC
string.body:
Defeat the Reconnaissance Troop of the 40th Army in theRunatorium 3 times.

Tip: You can only enter the Runatorium at certain times.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Collect_v70_18
string.body: [Universal] A crystal imbued with Aion's power

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Collect_v70_18_DESC
string.body:
Collect 700 Genesis Crystals.

TIP: You can receive them by capturing Lakrum Garrison, following an urgent order, or participating in Euron's conquest training.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Collect_v70_19
string.body: [Universal] A crystal imbued with Aion's power

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Collect_v70_19_DESC
string.body:
Collect 700 Genesis Crystals.

TIP: You can receive them by capturing Lakrum Garrison, following an urgent order, or participating in Elgard's conquest training.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Collect_v70_20_DESC
string.body:
Use magical crafting to make a legendary Daevanion Skill Chest.

Tip:Clarotti or Vanu will give you a Daevanion Wisdom Insignia for crafting.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Collect_v70_21_DESC
string.body:
Purchase items from the Battlefield Supply Quartermaster or the Battlefield Supply Booster in Neviwind Canyon.

Tip: You can earn the Battlefield Points you need to make a purchase in a variety of ways in the Neviwind Canyon.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_ItemPlay_v70_06
string.body: [Universal] Are we allowed to use it again today?

string.name: STR_Lugbug_ItemPlay_v70_06_DESC
string.body:
Use Stellium directly 3 times.

TIP: After level 80, it can be used directly by double-clicking (right-clicking) in the inventory (cube).

string.name: STR_Daily_DESC_Lv01_75
string.body: When you reach Level 76, you can receive a new mission and better rewards from 9:00 AM the next day.

string.name: STR_Weekly_DESC_Lv01_75
string.body: When you reach level 76, you can receive a new mission and even better rewards from 9:00 AM every Wednesday.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Collect_v70_22_DESC
string.body:
Receive 1x Leibo Jam.

Tip: You receive this item as a [Final Daily Reward] for a [Daily Mission].

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Collect_v70_23_DESC
string.body:
Receive 3x Leibo Jam.

Tip: You receive this item as a [Final Daily Reward] for a [Daily Mission].

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Collect_v70_24_DESC
string.body:
Receive Leibo Jam seven times.

TIP: You can get this item as a [Final Daily Reward] for a [Daily Mission].

string.name: STR_Lugbug_ItemPlay_v70_07_DESC
string.body:
Use food, a drink, a transformation scroll or a transformation potion 30 times.

TIP: Can also be used with the minion's [Buff Master] function.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Quest_v70_13_DESC
string.body:
Complete 1 of lost Lugbug's quests.

TIP: You automatically receive Lost Lugbug's quest once a day when you enter Dumaha.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_hunt_v70_15_DESC
string.body:
Kill 20 monsters in the Dumaha Plains Region..

Tip: The Dumaha Plains Region includes the Valley of the Blessed, the Rega Guard Post and the Foot of Edoma Mountain.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_hunt_v70_16_DESC
string.body:
Kill 20 monsters in the Dumaha Volcanic Region.

Tip: The Dumaha Volcanic Region includes the Exitus Camp, Drytongue and the Volcanic Relics Excavation Site.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_hunt_v70_17_DESC
string.body:
Kill 20 monsters in the Dumaha Desert Region.

Tip: The Dumaha Desert Region includes the Outlaw Region, the Suhara Desert and the Heart of Snuwa.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_hunt_v70_18_DESC
string.body:
Kill 20 Wasteland Snuwa in Dumaha.

TIP: The Wasteland Snuwa of Dumaha are found mainly in the Heart of Snuwa.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_hunt_v70_19_DESC
string.body:
Kill 20 Rega Drakan in Dumaha.

TIP: The Rega Drakan of Dumaha can be found mainly at the Rega Guard Post and in the Exitus Camp.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_hunt_v70_20_DESC
string.body:
Kill 20 outlaws in Dumaha.

TIP: The Dumaha outlaws are usually poisoned by Nakisix and are located in the Outlaw Region.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_treasurehunter_01_DESC
string.body:
Defeat 50 Red Nose Grankers.

TIP: Red Nose Grankers live in Lakrum and Dumaha.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_treasurehunter_02_DESC
string.body:
Use the skills pearls sold by antler expert Bakaki five times.

TIP: Antler expert Bakaki lives in Stellusia in Dumaha.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_treasurehunter_03_DESC
string.body:
Receive the nose of the Red Nose Granker King once after defeating him.

TIP: The Red Nose Granker King appears daily during the event in Dumaha at 9:30 PM and 11 PM.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_treasurehunter_04_DESC
string.body:
Use a Granker Treasure Map once.

TIP: Granker Treasure Maps can only be used in certain locations.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_treasurehunter_05_DESC
string.body:
Defeat 300 Red Nose Grankers.

TIP: Red Nose Grankers live in Lakrum and Dumaha.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_treasurehunter_06_DESC
string.body:
Obtain 1 special Granker Treasure Map.

TIP: You have a certain chance of obtaining it if you acquire unknown treasure maps for Ionion the archaeologist.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Enter_v70_07_DESC
string.body:
Enter 1 instance with difficulty level 'difficult'.

TIP: You can find a list of available instances under [Start Menu] - [Instance Info].

string.name: STR_INDUN_ITEM_INFO_IDF7_WEAPON_H
string.body: Light Fragment Earrings, Rings, Belts, Necklace/Ultimate Starlight Anima Stones/Legendary Manastones, Gold Cubelets

string.name: STR_MISSION_18_TITLE
string.body: Test Mission 18: Use Stigma Enchantment Stone

string.name: STR_MISSION_19_DESC
string.body: Tabby Bunny Hat: Use Protective Shield

string.name: STR_MISSION_20_DESC
string.body:
Use 3 Transformation Contracts.

Tip: Use Lugbug's Transformation Contract (62 types).

string.name: STR_MISSION_21_DESC
string.body: [Event] Combine 10 Torn Granker Treasure Maps 3 times

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_alonetogether_01_DESC
string.body:
Destroy Snuwa Prison and save the imprisoned fairies 20 times.

Tip: The imprisoned fairies appear near the Dumaha Altar daily at 1:00 PM and 9:00 PM.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_alonetogether_02_DESC
string.body:
[Event] Collect 300 Fairy Drops.

Tip: You will receive event rewards if you bring water drops to the Lonely Fairy in Stellusia in Dumaha.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_alonetogether_03
string.body: How to collect Fairy Drops on your own

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_alonetogether_03_DESC
string.body:
Destroy Snuwa Prison and save the imprisoned fairies 200 times.

Tip: The imprisoned fairies appear near the Dumaha Altar daily at 1:00 PM and 9:00 PM.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_alonetogether_04
string.body: How to collect Fairy Drops together

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_alonetogether_04_DESC
string.body:
Defeat the Obituary Boss Monster in Dumaha and collect a trophy.

Tip: The Obituary Boss Monster appears at 8:30 PM from Monday to Friday and at 2:00 PM and 8:30 PM on weekends.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_alonetogether_05_DESC
string.body:
Defeat the Obituary Boss Monster in the Legion Banquet Hall and collect 5 trophies.

Tip: You can enter the Legion Banquet Hall via the Banquet Hall Entrance in Stellusia in Dumaha.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_hunt_v70_21_DESC
string.body:
Destroy the Ashunatal Legion on the Ashunatal Dredgion 5 times.

Tip: You can only enter the Ashunatal Dredgion at certain times.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Collect_v70_25_DESC
string.body:
Go to the Transformation Statue in Illumiel to purchase a Transformation Scroll.

Tip: You can only enter Illumiel at certain times.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Enter_v70_08_DESC
string.body:
A New Day Dawns in Atreia.

Tip: You can complete this quest by logging in or teleporting.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Quest_v70_14_DESC
string.body:
Complete a Quest for Altar Development Assistance.

Tip: You are assigned the Quest for Altar Development Assistance when the Elyos capture an altar in Dumaha.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Quest_v70_15_DESC
string.body:
Complete a Quest for Altar Development Assistance.

Tip: You are assigned the Quest for Altar Development Assistance when the Asmodians capture an altar in Dumaha.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_ItemPlay_v70_08_DESC
string.body:
Use Leibo Protection 3 times.

Tip: You can buy Leibo Protection in the Gold Sand Shop up to the weekly limit.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_Live_6thPatch_01
string.body: [15 Points/Daily] Battle for Your Faction's Honour

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_Live_6thPatch_01_DESC
string.body:
Complete a Quest for the Guardian General Battle at the 10th Altar in Dumaha.

Tip: You are assigned the Quest for the Guardian General Battle when you fulfil a certain condition.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_Live_6thPatch_02
string.body: [15 Points/Weekly] Memories of the Kamar Battlefield

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_Live_6thPatch_02_DESC
string.body:
Enter the Kamar Battlefield 1 time.

Tip: You can enter the Kamar Battlefield at a certain time every Saturday.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_Live_6thPatch_03_DESC
string.body:
Defeat the suffering, angry Prometun in Prometun's Workshop 1 time (difficult).

Tip: You can enter Prometun's Workshop (difficult) through the Temple of Endorim in Lakrum.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_Live_6thPatch_04_DESC
string.body:
Collect 150 Stellium.

Tip: You can obtain Stellium through Altar Siege Battles or Quests in Dumaha.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_Live_6thPatch_05_L_DESC
string.body:
Defeat raging Mahorosh in Narakkalli 2 times.

Tip: You can enter Narakkalli through the Lookout Post of the Dragonfly Forest in Lakrum.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_Live_6thPatch_05_D_DESC
string.body:
Defeat the raging Mahorosh in Narakkalli 2 times.

Tip: You can enter Narakkalli through the Lookout Post of the Mysterious Mushroom Colony in Lakrum.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_Live_6thPatch_06_DESC
string.body:
Enter Neviwind Canyon 1 time.

Tip: You can only enter Neviwind Canyon at certain times.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_ToyFactory_01_DESC
string.body:
Run Gamerunerk's Toy Factory!

Tip: You can complete this quest by logging in or teleporting.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_ToyFactory_02_DESC
string.body:
Defeat 70 monsters in Dumaha.

Tip: You can complete the quest more quickly with assistance from group members.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_ToyFactory_03_DESC
string.body:
Find Light Capsules and collect 3 Broken Toys.

Tip: You can find broken toys in light capsules in Dumaha.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_ToyFactory_04_DESC
string.body:
Complete the Dumaha Urgent Orders Quest 1 time.

Tip: The Dumaha Urgent Orders Quest is available on the Dumaha Prairie, in the Dumaha Rocky Desert, in the Dumaha No-Man's Land, at the Dumaha Sand Flows and at Dumaha's Magma Chamber.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_ToyFactory_05_DESC
string.body:
Complete the Dumaha Urgent Orders Quest 3 times.

Tip: The Dumaha Urgent Orders Quest is available on the Dumaha Prairie, in the Dumaha Rocky Desert, in the Dumaha No-Man's Land, at the Dumaha Sand Flows and at Dumaha's Magma Chamber.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_ToyFactory_06_DESC
string.body:
Complete the Dumaha Urgent Orders Quest 5 times.

Tip: The Dumaha Urgent Orders Quest is available on the Dumaha Prairie, in the Dumaha Rocky Desert, in the Dumaha No-Man's Land, at the Dumaha Sand Flows and at Dumaha's Magma Chamber.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_ToyFactory_07_DESC
string.body:
Defeat the Weakling Daeva Mob Leader in the Stella Development Laboratory (easy) 2 times.

Tip: The Stella Development Laboratory is located in Western Suhara.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_ToyFactory_08_DESC
string.body:
Defeat the suffering, angry Prigga in Prometun's Workshop 2 times.

Tip: You can enter Prometun's Workshop through the Temple of Endorim in Lakrum.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_BattleMaterial_01_DESC
string.body:
Investigate a Winding Tower in Dumaha!

Tip: You can complete this quest by logging in or teleporting.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_BattleMaterial_02_DESC
string.body:
Defeat Opal Thief Shukiruk 10 times.

Tip: Opal Thief Shukiruk can be found in a certain location in Dumaha.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_BattleMaterial_03_L
string.body: [1 Point/Daily] No Resources for the Asmodians!

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_BattleMaterial_03_L_DESC
string.body:
Complete a scouting quest to conserve resources.

Tip: The Guardian Crisis Consultant will assign you the resource conservation scouting quest.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_BattleMaterial_03_D
string.body: [1 Point/Daily] No Resources for the Elyos!

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_BattleMaterial_03_D_DESC
string.body:
Complete a scouting quest to conserve resources.

Tip: The Archon Crisis Consultant will assign you the resource conservation scouting quest.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_BattleMaterial_04
string.body: [2 Points/Daily] Destroy a Winding Tower to collect Resources

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_BattleMaterial_04_DESC
string.body:
Destroy 2 Winding Towers or Reinforced Winding Towers.

Tip: You can seriously damage the Winding Tower using a Tunnel Explosive from the Gold Sand Shop.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_BattleMaterial_05_DESC
string.body:
Extract 10 Drakan Opals.

Tip: You can extract Drakan Opals using an Opal Dismantler from the Gold Sand Shop.

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_STOLEN_PAY_ETERNAL
string.body:
Your account has been permanently banned on all of our servers due to outstanding payments as per our T&Cs and Terms of Use for our services.
You can find further information on the official AION Support website (https://aion.support.gameforge.com/en).

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_Devaranger_01_DESC
string.body:
Defeat Count Ghory 1 time.

Tip: Count Ghory is an evil contemporary who revels in the misfortune of others and even contributes to it.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_Devaranger_02_DESC
string.body:
Collect 30 keys to Ghory's Treasure Chest.

Tip: You can obtain the keys to Ghory's Treasure Chest when you achieve rank S to C in House Ghory's Gold Vault.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_Devaranger_03_DESC
string.body:
Achieve rank S in House Ghory's Gold Vault 3 times.

Tip: You achieve rank S by defeating Count Ghory within a certain time.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_Devaranger_04_DESC
string.body:
Achieve rank S in House Ghory's Gold Vault 5 times.

Tip: You achieve rank S by defeating Count Ghory within a certain time.

string.name: STR_RESURRECT_TRAINING_DESC
string.body: You are resurrected in the Orbis Training Arena in Stellusia Village.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_PHYSICAL_CRITICAL_DAMAGE_BOOST_RATE
string.body: Skill that increases crit strike damage. The higher the number, the more powerful the crit strike.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_MAGICAL_CRITICAL_DAMAGE_BOOST_RATE
string.body: Skill that increases crit spell damage. The higher the number, the more powerful the crit spell.

string.name: STR_TransCollection_039
string.body: I call the shots around here

string.name: STR_TransCollection_043
string.body: The face complements the outfit perfectly

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_AIONFarm_01_DESC
string.body:
Remove Climbing Kale 1 time in Dumaha.

Tip: Climbing Kale grows all over Dumaha.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_AIONFarm_02_DESC
string.body:
Use either Simple Seeds or Beautiful Colourful Seeds in Dumaha 3 times.

Tip: Each seed can be sown in certain places.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_AIONFarm_03_DESC
string.body:
Harvest either one Exquisite Fruit or one Gourmand Fruit.

Tip: Fruit grown from seeds goes through four stages of development: germination, growth, ripening, and harvesting.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_AIONFarm_04_DESC
string.body:
Fetch a Full Bucket of Water.

Tip: You will receive a full bucket of water if you go to Dumaha Swamps with anEmpty Bucket.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Quest_v72_01_DESC
string.body:
Complete a Quest for the Guardian General Battle at the 10th Altar in Dumaha.

Tip: You are assigned the Quest for the Guardian General Battle when you fulfil a certain condition.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Quest_v72_02_DESC
string.body:
Complete the [Urgent Orders Quest] Katalam Depot Defence 6 times.

Tip: You are assigned the Urgent Orders Quest automatically at a certain location in Katalam.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_hunt_v72_01_DESC
string.body:
Defeat the Acid Mist Shaman in the 15th Basement once.

Tip: You can enter the Tower of Challenge through the lobby of the Empyrean Crucible.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Collect_v72_01_DESC
string.body:
Win 1 time in the Arena of Discipline or the Arena of Cooperation.

Tip: You can only enter the Arena of Discipline and the Arena of Cooperation at certain times.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_itemplay_v72_01_DESC
string.body: Use an Enchantment Stone to enchant your equipment 3 times.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_pvp_V72_01_DESC
string.body:
Complete 300 PvP battles.

Tip: The level of the target must not be more than 5 levels lower than your character.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_DevaLegend_01
string.body: Daeva Development: The Path to Becoming a True Daeva

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_DevaLegend_02
string.body: Daeva Lucky Find: A Wish Fulfilled

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_DevaLegend_03
string.body: [Daily] Daeva Lucky Find: Teaching the Rabbit Bandit a Lesson

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_DevaLegend_06
string.body: [Weekly] Daeva Transformation: Capturing the New Tower of Challenge

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_DevaLegend_07
string.body: [Weekly] Daeva Transformation: To Victory in Runatorium!

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_DevaLegend_01_DESC
string.body:
Obtain 2 PvE Hunting Wind Shavings.

Tip: PvE Hunting Wind Shavings can be obtained through the Instruction Quest in the Quest Journal [J].

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_DevaLegend_02_DESC
string.body:
Obtain a Noble Treasure Chest.

Tip: You can obtain the Noble Treasure Chest at the Magic Spring.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_DevaLegend_03_DESC
string.body:
Defeat the Thieving Rabbit Bandit 50 times.

Tip: The Thieving Rabbit Bandit can be found in Lakrum and in Dumaha.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_DevaLegend_04_DESC
string.body:
Collect a valuable Daeva Trophy.

Tip: You obtain the trophy when a group member opens the Sealed Treasure Chest with the Daeva's Skeleton Key.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_DevaLegend_05_DESC
string.body:
Obtain a Beritra Bundle 7 times.

Tip: You can obtain Etium, Stellium and a Genesis Crystal from a Beritra Bundle.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_DevaLegend_06_DESC
string.body:
Defeat the correct Goldsqueak on Level 8 of the Tower of Challenge (lower level) 2 times.

Tip: You can enter the Tower of Challenge 4 times per week and select either the basement or the middle level.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_DevaLegend_07_DESC
string.body:
Defeat Kunax the Slayer in the Runatorium 1 time.

Tip: You can enter the Runatorium at certain times on Tuesdays, Fridays and Sundays.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_DevaLegend_08_DESC
string.body:
Defeat the Dark Mage Bukarota in Hererim Mine 3 times.

Tip: You can enter Hererim Mine through the Heavenly Lights Garrison in Lakrum.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_DevaLegend_09_DESC
string.body:
Defeat the Dark Mage Bukarota in Hererim Mine 3 times.

Tip: You can enter Hererim Mine through the Shadowbringers Garrison in Lakrum.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_TheWar_02
string.body: [3 Points/Daily] Fire Hazard! Day and Night!

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_TheWar_01_DESC
string.body:
Finish off 30 Ember Monsters that are setting fire to Dumaha.

Tip: You'll find the Ember Monsters in Dumaha.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_TheWar_02_DESC
string.body:
Finish off 30 Fire Monsters that are setting fire to Dumaha.

Tip: The Fire Monsters appear in Dumaha between 8 PM and 9 PM.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_TheWar_03_DESC
string.body:
Use Splashy 30 times.

Tip: You can receive Splashy through event missions as a login reward or in the Gold Sand shop.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_TheWar_04_DESC
string.body:
Finish off 150 Ember Monsters that are setting fire to Dumaha.

Tip: You'll find the Ember Monsters in Dumaha.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_TheWar_05_DESC
string.body:
Finish off 150 Fire Monsters that are setting fire to Dumaha.

Tip: The Fire Monsters appear in Dumaha between 8 PM and 9 PM.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_TheWar_06_DESC
string.body:
Use Splashy 100 times.

Tip: You can receive Splashy through event missions as a login reward or in the Gold Sand shop.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Collect_v72_02_DESC
string.body:
Collect 120 Battle Insignias.

Tip: You can exchange the insignias with Hart, Kairan, Pasirunerk and Hasirunerk for various items.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Collect_v72_03_DESC
string.body:
Collect 120 Battle Insignias.

Tip: You can exchange the insignias with Rotelli, Azina, Pasirunerk and Hasirunerk for various items.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_TotalWorldPlayTime_BODY
string.body: You can now enter the Abyss Rift. This entry permit disappears when you enter Red Katalam. If the Abyss Rift disappears, you'll be denied entry to Red Katalam or you'll be expelled from Red Katalam.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_Ring_07
string.body: [3 Points/Daily] The Search for the Ring Fragments

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_Ring_01_DESC
string.body:
Complete the Dumaha Urgent Orders Quest twice.

Tip: The Dumaha Urgent Orders Quest is available on the Dumaha Prairie, in the Dumaha Rocky Desert, in the Dumaha No-Man's Land, at the Dumaha Sand Flows and at Dumaha's Magma Chamber.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_Ring_02_DESC
string.body:
Receive an [Event] Promise Ring.

Tip: Collect Promise Ring Shards and join them together to receive a Promise Ring.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_Ring_03_DESC
string.body:
Kill 50 Cursed Ribbits.

Tip: Cursed Ribbits can be found in Dumaha.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_Ring_04_DESC
string.body:
Identify a Promise Ring.

Tip: Take the Promise Ring to Pamred in Stellusia to have him specify the ring's class.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_Ring_05_DESC
string.body:
Improve a Promise Ring.

Tip: You can improve the Promise Ring atAinio's in Stellusia.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_Ring_06_DESC
string.body:
Use the Ancient Promise Ring, Legendary Promise Ring and Ultimate Promise Ring 10 times.

Tip: Depending on its class, the Promise Ring can be used in different regions.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_Ring_07_DESC
string.body:
Kill 10 monsters that have stolen the Promise Ring Fragments.

Tip: Take out Nergal, Beritra, Prigga, theWeakling Daeva Mob Leader and the Daeva Mob Leader.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_Ring_08_DESC
string.body:
Take out the Ancient Creatures and receive [Event] Ancient Trophy 3 times.

Tip: You'll receive the Ancient Trophy by taking out Ancient Creatures in Dumaha.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Collect_v72_04_DESC
string.body:
Collect 15x Ponica Fibre, Carbonium and Peridot in Red Katalam.

Tip: This task can also be completed by just one group member.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Collect_v72_05_DESC
string.body:
Collect 15x Ponica Fibre, Carbonium and Peridot in Red Katalam.

Tip: This task can also be completed by just one group member.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_hunt_v72_02_DESC
string.body:
Finish off 50 monsters in Red Katalam.

Tip: Only the group with the highest target monster hit points is updated.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_hunt_v72_03_DESC
string.body:
Finish off 50 monsters in Red Katalam.

Tip: Only the group with the highest target monster hit points is updated.

string.name: STR_INDUN_ITEM_INFO_IDF8_HOUSE_NORMAL
string.body: Legendary and ultimate weapons /ultimate accessories /ultimate weapon chests crafting designs

string.name: STR_World_dmaha_mind_larak_DESC
string.body: Defeat the highest-level named monsters in Narakkalli.

string.name: STR_World_dmaha_mind_holytower_DESC
string.body: Defeat the highest-level named monsters in the Holy Tower.

string.name: STR_World_dmaha_mind_prigida_DESC
string.body: Defeat the highest-level named monsters in Prometun's Workshop (easy)

string.name: STR_World_dmaha_mind_mana_DESC
string.body: Defeat the highest-level named monsters in Makarna of Bitterness.

string.name: STR_World_dmaha_mind_easy_lab_DESC
string.body: Defeat the highest-level named monsters in the Stella Development Laboratory (easy).

string.name: STR_World_dmaha_mind_hard_lab_DESC
string.body: Defeat the highest-level named monsters in the Stella Development Laboratory (normal).
